english: You ought not to have spent so much money on your hobby.
spanish: No debieron haber gastado tanto dinero en su pasatiempo.

english: You ought not to have spent so much money on your hobby.
spanish: No debiste haber gastado tanto dinero en tu pasatiempo.

english: You should avail yourself of every opportunity to learn.
spanish: Deberías aprovecharte de cada oportunidad para aprender.

english: You should rewrite this sentence. It doesn't make sense.
spanish: Deberías reescribir esta frase; no tiene sentido.

english: You should spend more time outside and less time inside.
spanish: Deberías pasar más tiempo fuera y menos tiempo dentro.

english: You shouldn't allow your son to act like a selfish brat.
spanish: No deberías permitir que tu hijo se comporte como un mocoso engreído.

english: You shouldn't allow your son to always have his own way.
spanish: No deberías permitir a tu hijo salirse siempre con la suya.

english: You will have studied English for four years next March.
spanish: Habrás estudiado inglés por cuatro años el próximo marzo.

english: You're the only Canadian I know that doesn't like bacon.
spanish: Eres el único canadiense que conozco al que no le guste el tocino.

english: You're the only one who knows how to get to Tom's house.
spanish: Eres la única que sabe cómo llegar a la casa de Tom.

english: You're the only person I know that doesn't like bananas.
spanish: Eres la única persona que conozco a la que no le gustan los plátanos.

english: Your father's supporters are not limited to his friends.
spanish: Los aliados de tu padre no son solamente sus amigos.

english: Your mother must have been beautiful when she was young.
spanish: Tu madre debe haber sido hermosa cuando joven.

english: "Could you do this instead of me?" "Sorry, I'm too busy."
spanish: "¿Podrías hacerlo en mi lugar?" "Lo siento, estoy muy ocupado."

english: "Do you mind if I use your phone?" "No, please go ahead."
spanish: ''¿Te importa si ocupo tu celular?'' ''No, por favor, adelante''.

english: "Lottery tickets are a waste of money." "Not if you win."
spanish: "Los boletos de lotería son una pérdida de dinero." "No si ganas."

english: A burglar broke into my house while I was away on a trip.
spanish: Un ladrón entró en mi casa mientras estaba de viaje.

english: A girl gave me an orange in exchange for a piece of cake.
spanish: Una chica me dio una naranja a cambio de un trozo de tarta.

english: A girl gave me an orange in exchange for a piece of cake.
spanish: Una chica me dio una naranja a cambio de un pedazo de torta.

english: A man can't always be a hero, but he can always be a man.
spanish: No siempre se puede ser héroe, pero siempre se puede ser hombre.

english: A man can't always be a hero, but he can always be a man.
spanish: Un hombre no siempre puede ser un héroe, pero siempre puede ser un hombre.

english: A passport is usually necessary when you travel overseas.
spanish: Un pasaporte es generalmente necesario cuando viajas al extranjero.

english: A person with a BMI of 25 to 29 is considered overweight.
spanish: Se considera que una persona con un IMC de 25 a 29 padece sobrepeso.

english: A person with average intelligence would understand that.
spanish: Alguien con inteligencia promedio debería poder entenderlo.

english: A small toolkit can be very handy when you are traveling.
spanish: Un pequeño juego de herramientas puede ser muy útil cuando vas de viaje.

english: A voyage to the moon in a spaceship is no longer a dream.
spanish: Un viaje a la luna en una nave espacial ya no es un sueño.

english: According to the weather forecast, it will snow tomorrow.
spanish: De acuerdo con el pronóstico del tiempo, caerá nieve mañana.

english: After his wife died, he lived for quite a few more years.
spanish: Él vivió varios años más tras la muerte de su esposa.

english: After hours of walking, they stopped to pray in a church.
spanish: Tras caminar durante horas, se pararon a orar en una iglesia.

english: After much reflection, I decided not to accept the offer.
spanish: Luego de mucho reflexionar decidí no aceptar la oferta.

english: After much reflection, I decided not to accept the offer.
spanish: Después de una amplia reflexión he decidido no aceptar la oferta.

english: All humans on Earth are descended from a common ancestor.
spanish: Todos los humanos de la Tierra descienden de un ancestro común.

english: All of you are welcome to bring your spouses to my party.
spanish: Todos ustedes pueden traer sus parejas a mi fiesta.

english: All you have to do is push this button to take a picture.
spanish: Solo tienes que pulsar este botón para sacar una foto.

english: Are there any religions that don't permit organ donation?
spanish: ¿Hay alguna religión que no permita la donación de órganos?

english: Are you sure you don't want me to talk to Tom about that?
spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que no quieres que hable de eso con Tom?

english: Are you sure you want to borrow Tom's car without asking?
spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres coger prestado el coche de Tom sin pedírselo?

english: Around the year 174 AD, his people revolted against Rome.
spanish: Alrededor del año 174 a.C., su gente se volvió contra Roma.

english: Arthritis is a painful condition that affects the joints.
spanish: La artritis es una enfermedad dolorosa que afecta a las articulaciones.

english: As far as I know, this is the only translation available.
spanish: Hasta donde yo sé, esta es la única traducción disponible.

english: As soon as he got home, he began to play a computer game.
spanish: Él se puso a jugar un juego de computador tan pronto como llegó a la casa.

english: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
spanish: Tan pronto como confíes en ti mismo, sabrás cómo vivir.

english: At the start of every weekend, I am both tired and happy.
spanish: Yo ando a la vez cansado y feliz al comienzo de cada fin de semana.

english: Because of the heavy rain, we were obliged to stay there.
spanish: Debido a la abundante lluvia, nos vimos obligados a permanecer allí.

english: Because the traffic light turned red, he stopped his car.
spanish: Como el semáforo se puso rojo, paró el coche.

english: Businessmen could not pay back money they owed the banks.
spanish: Los empresarios no podían devolverles a los bancos el dinero que les debían.

english: Chestnuts have to be boiled for at least fifteen minutes.
spanish: Hay que cocer las castañas por al menos quince minutos.

english: Common causes of stress are work and human relationships.
spanish: Causas comunes de estrés son el trabajo y las relaciones humanas.

english: Compared with America or China, Japan is a small country.
spanish: Comparado con Estados Unidos o China, Japón es un país pequeño.

english: Considering everything, my father's life was a happy one.
spanish: Tomándolo todo en cuenta, la vida de mi padre fue feliz.

english: Country people are traditionally suspicious of strangers.
spanish: La gente del campo es tradicionalmente sospechosa para los extraños.

english: Cuzco is one of the most interesting places in the world.
spanish: Cuzco es uno de los lugares más interesantes del mundo.

english: Deaf people often talk to each other using sign language.
spanish: Los sordos suelen hablarse entre ellos usando lenguaje de señas.

english: Despite adversity, the architect achieved worldwide fame.
spanish: A pesar de la adversidad, el arquitecto consiguió fama mundial.

english: Did Tom tell you about what he and Mary did last weekend?
spanish: ¿Te contó Tom lo que él y Mary hicieron el fin de semana pasado?

english: Did you see the sunrise earlier? It was really beautiful.
spanish: ¿Miraste la salida del sol más temprano? Fue realmente hermoso.

english: Didn't it ever occur to them that they would be punished?
spanish: ¿Nunca se les ocurrió que les castigarían?

english: Do not forget to turn the light off before you go to bed.
spanish: Que no se te olvide apagar la luz antes de irte a acostar.

english: Do we really want to spend the entire weekend doing this?
spanish: ¿De verdad queremos pasarnos todo el fin de semana haciendo esto?

english: Do you have any idea how many eggs are consumed per year?
spanish: ¿Tiene idea de cuántos huevos son consumidos por año?

english: Do you know how many people will be at the party tonight?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuánta gente habrá en la fiesta esta noche?

english: Do you still think you'll be able to do that by yourself?
spanish: ¿Todavía crees que serás capaz de hacerlo solo?

english: Do you think you can handle a few minutes alone with Tom?
spanish: ¿Crees que eres capaz de pasar un par de minutos sola con Tom?

english: Do you want to go out to a movie with me on Friday night?
spanish: ¿Quieres salir a ver una película conmigo el viernes por la noche?

english: Don't believe people who claim that they know everything.
spanish: No le creas a la gente que dice saberlo todo.

english: Don't make me angry. You wouldn't like me when I'm angry.
spanish: No me hagas enfadar. No te agradaría verme enfadado.

english: Don't waste your youth, otherwise you'll regret it later.
spanish: No malgastes tu juventud, si no, lo lamentarás más tarde.

english: Don't you think you ought to write them a thank-you note?
spanish: ¿No crees que deberías escribirles una nota de agradecimiento?

english: Ethnic minorities struggle against prejudice and poverty.
spanish: Las minorías étnicas combaten contra el prejuicio y la pobreza.

english: Even a child knows what it is like to be without friends.
spanish: Incluso un niño sabe lo que es no tener amigos.

english: Even plastic surgery won't do anything for your ugliness.
spanish: Ni siquiera la cirugía plástica hará nada con tu fealdad.

english: Even though I could take a bus to school, I usually walk.
spanish: Aunque podría coger el autobús a la escuela, normalmente voy a pie.

english: Even when she's not wearing makeup, she's very beautiful.
spanish: Incluso cuando ella no lleva maquillaje, es muy hermosa.

english: Every noun in Portuguese is either masculine or feminine.
spanish: Cada sustantivo en portugués es masculino o femenino.

english: Everyone who worked on that project became a millionaire.
spanish: Todo el mundo que trabajó en ese proyecto se convirtió en millonario.

english: Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
spanish: A cada uno le gustaría creer que los sueños pueden ser realidad.

english: Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
spanish: Les gustaría creer que los sueños pueden convertirse en realidad.

english: Excuse me, but could you scoot over a little bit, please?
spanish: Discúlpeme, pero ¿podría moverse un poco a un lado, por favor?

english: Finally she gave in to temptation and ate the whole cake.
spanish: Finalmente ella cedió a la tentación y se comió toda la torta.

english: First, I can't go. Second, I wouldn't go even if I could.
spanish: Primero, no puedo ir. Segundo, no iría aunque pudiera.

english: Had I realized what you intended, I wouldn't have agreed.
spanish: Si me hubiera dado cuenta de lo que tramabas, no lo habría concedido.

english: Had he tried it once more, he would have succeeded in it.
spanish: Si hubiera probado una vez más, hubiera tenido éxito.

english: Have you ever visited the office where your father works?
spanish: ¿Has visitado alguna vez la oficina en la que trabaja tu padre?

english: He can't be smart if he can screw up something like that.
spanish: Él no puede ser inteligente si puede arruinar algo como eso.

english: He cheated on the test by copying from the girl in front.
spanish: Él hizo trampas en el examen copiando de la chica que tenía delante.

english: He clung to the hope that he would see her again someday.
spanish: Él se aferró a la esperanza de que la volvería a ver algún día.

english: He disguised himself as a salesman and visited her house.
spanish: Él se disfrazó de vendedor y visitó su casa.

english: He has many foreign stamps, not to mention Japanese ones.
spanish: Él tiene muchos sellos extranjeros, sin mencionar los japoneses.

english: He is not more than two or three years younger than I am.
spanish: Él es a lo más dos o tres años más joven que yo.

english: He is not the sort of person who likes to listen to jazz.
spanish: Él no es el tipo de persona al que le gusta escuchar jazz.

english: He likes to just sit around and play video games all day.
spanish: A él le gusta sentarse y jugar videojuegos todo el día.

english: He never takes into account the fact that I am very busy.
spanish: Él nunca toma en cuenta el hecho de que estoy muy ocupado.

english: He regained consciousness three hours after the accident.
spanish: Recuperó la conciencia tres horas después del accidente.

english: He sings so well that it's impossible to hold back tears.
spanish: Él canta tan bien que es imposible contener las lágrimas.

english: He walked slowly so the children would be able to follow.
spanish: Anduvo lentamente de forma que los niños pudieran seguirlo.

english: He was exiled to an island for the crime of high treason.
spanish: Por el crimen de alta traición, él fue exiliado a una isla.

english: He will have spent all his money by the end of the month.
spanish: Habrá gastado todo su dinero de aquí a fin de mes.

english: He won't be easily discouraged, because he's a tough guy.
spanish: Él no se desalentará con facilidad, porque es un tipo duro.

english: Hello, it's me. Could you come pick me up at the station?
spanish: Hola, soy yo. ¿Podrías venir a recogerme en la estación?

english: Her book is famous not only in England but also in Japan.
spanish: Su libro es famoso no sólo en Inglaterra sino también en Japón.

english: His age didn't enter into our decision not to employ him.
spanish: Su edad no llegó a entrar en nuestra decisión de no emplearlo.

english: His height is a great advantage when he plays volleyball.
spanish: Su altura es una gran ventaja cuando juega a voleibol.

english: How long does it take to walk from here to the city hall?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleva caminar desde aquí hasta la municipalidad?

english: How many operations has Dr. Jackson performed this month?
spanish: ¿Cuántas operaciones ha realizado el doctor Jackson este mes?

english: How tall do you think my daughter will be in three years?
spanish: ¿Cuánto crees que mida mi hija dentro de tres años?

english: I agree with you that we need more women in this company.
spanish: Estoy de acuerdo con usted en que necesitamos más mujeres en esta empresa.

english: I am going to visit the art exhibition one of these days.
spanish: Voy a visitar la muestra de arte uno de estos días.

english: I assume you're referring to what happened here recently.
spanish: Asumo que te refieres a lo que pasó aquí recientemente.

english: I assume you've heard about what happened here yesterday.
spanish: Asumo que oíste sobre lo que pasó aquí ayer.

english: I became very nervous when I couldn't locate my passport.
spanish: Me puse muy nervioso cuando no pude encontrar mi pasaporte.

english: I called up my friend to congratulate him on his success.
spanish: Llamé a mi amigo para felicitarlo por su éxito.

english: I can't believe you're going to give away all your money.
spanish: No puedo creer que vayas a entregar todo tu dinero.

english: I can't really be certain that Tom didn't take the money.
spanish: En efecto, no puedo estar seguro de que Tom no haya tomado el dinero.

english: I cannot see the hummingbird, because it is too far away.
spanish: No puedo ver el colibrí porque está demasiado lejos.

english: I closed the door quietly so I wouldn't wake the baby up.
spanish: Cerré suavemente la puerta para no despertar al bebé.

english: I could not sleep well last night, because it was so hot.
spanish: No pude dormir bien anoche porque hacía mucho calor.

english: I didn't say anything because I didn't know what tot say.
spanish: No dije nada, porque no sabía qué decir.

english: I didn't understand much of what they were talking about.
spanish: No entendí mucho de lo que estaban hablando.

english: I didn't want to spend any more time looking for my keys.
spanish: Yo no quería pasar más tiempo buscando las llaves.

english: I don't blame you for the accident. It wasn't your fault.
spanish: No te culpo por el accidente. No fue culpa tuya.

english: I don't enjoy studying because I don't make any progress.
spanish: No disfruto estudiando porque no hago ningún progreso.

english: I don't feel like working today, so let's go play soccer.
spanish: Hoy no tengo ganas de trabajar, así que vamos a jugar al fútbol.

english: I don't know how to legally get around those regulations.
spanish: No sé cómo sortear legalmente esas normativas.

english: I don't know how to legally get around those regulations.
spanish: No sé cómo eludir legalmente esas regulaciones.

english: I don't want anyone to find where we buried the treasure.
spanish: No quiero que encuentre nadie dónde enterramos el tesoro.

english: I got up at 4:00, ate some food, then went back to sleep.
spanish: Me levanté a las cuatro, comí algo y me volví a dormir.

english: I have a job interview at two o'clock tomorrow afternoon.
spanish: Tengo una entrevista de trabajo mañana a las dos de la tarde.

english: I have recently become accustomed to his way of speaking.
spanish: Recientemente me he acostumbrado a su forma de hablar.

english: I haven't been back here since that unfortunate incident.
spanish: Yo no había vuelto aquí desde aquel desafortunado incidente.

english: I hope I get a chance to return the favor you've done me.
spanish: Ojalá pudiera devolverte el favor que me hiciste.

english: I hope you've got some proof to back up your allegations.
spanish: Espero que tengas alguna prueba que corrobore tus alegaciones.

english: I never imagined I'd be able to give a concert in Boston.
spanish: Jamás imaginé que yo podría dar un concierto en Boston.

english: I opened the door and saw two boys standing side by side.
spanish: Abrí la puerta y vi a dos chicos parados lado a lado.

english: I promised Tom and I really don't want to disappoint him.
spanish: Se lo prometí a Tom y no tengo ninguna intención de defraudarle.

english: I remember a time when we could tell each other anything.
spanish: Recuerdo la época en que podíamos contárnoslo todo.

english: I saw the students cleaning their classroom after school.
spanish: Vi a los estudiantes limpiando sus salas después de clases.

english: I shouldn't have used the word "password" as my password.
spanish: No debería haber usado la palabra "contraseña" como contraseña.

english: I spoke to the boy, who seemed to be older than the girl.
spanish: Hablé con el joven, que parecía ser mayor que la niña.

english: I stayed home last night to be able to receive your call.
spanish: Anoche me quedé en casa para poder recibir tu llamada.

english: I stayed in bed one more day just to be on the safe side.
spanish: Me quedé otro día más en cama para estar seguro.

english: I still have the sweater you gave me when I was thirteen.
spanish: Todavía tengo el jersey que me diste cuando tenía trece años.

english: I think Tom's grandmother is too old to wear a miniskirt.
spanish: Yo pienso que la abuela de Tom es demasiado vieja para ponerse minifalda.

english: I think it's a good thing because it keep us on our toes.
spanish: Creo que es algo bueno porque nos mantiene con los pies en el suelo.

english: I think it's a good thing because it keep us on our toes.
spanish: Pienso que es un cosa buena porque nos mantiene sobre nuestros pies.

english: I think it's dangerous for children to swim in this lake.
spanish: Creo que es peligroso que los niños naden en este lago.

english: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom will show up today.
spanish: Creo que es muy improbable que Tom aparezca hoy.

english: I think it's time for me to discuss the problem with her.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que discuta el problema con ella.

english: I think it's time for me to give up on this relationship.
spanish: Creo que es hora de darme por vencido con esta relación.

english: I think it's unhealthy to eat more than 20 oranges a day.
spanish: Pienso que es poco saludable comer más de 20 naranjas en un día.

english: I think we should use our time a bit more constructively.
spanish: Creo que deberíamos utilizar nuestro tiempo de una forma un poco más constructiva.

english: I thought I'd drop in to see you before I went to Boston.
spanish: Pensé en pasarme a verte antes de irme a Boston.

english: I thought Tom would surprise Mary and take her to dinner.
spanish: Pensé que Tom sorprendería a María y la llevaría a cenar.

english: I took it for granted that she would come to our wedding.
spanish: Di por sentado que ella acudiría a nuestra boda.

english: I tried to break the door open, which I found impossible.
spanish: Intenté abrir la puerta a golpes, pero fue imposible.

english: I understand your point of view, but don't agree with it.
spanish: Entiendo tu punto de vista, pero no lo comparto.

english: I want to find out how many people died in that accident.
spanish: Quiero descubrir cuántas personas murieron en ese accidente.

english: I wanted to catch the bird, but I found it too difficult.
spanish: Quería atrapar al pájaro, pero resultó muy difícil.

english: I was going to ask Tom about it but never got the chance.
spanish: Iba a preguntarle a Tom sobre ello, pero nunca tuve la oportunidad.

english: I will give you a good example to illustrate what I mean.
spanish: Te daré un buen ejemplo para ilustrar lo que quiero decir.

english: I wish to express my deep appreciation for your kindness.
spanish: Quiero expresar mi más profundo agradecimiento por su bondad.

english: I work part-time as a receptionist at a dentist's office.
spanish: Trabajo de media jornada como recepcionista en una clínica dental.

english: I would like to have a look at your collection of stamps.
spanish: Me gustaría echar un vistazo a tu colección de sellos.

english: I wouldn't want to do anything that would make Tom angry.
spanish: No quisiera hacer nada que hiciera enojar a Tom.

english: I'd just like to know what you knew and when you knew it.
spanish: Solo quisiera saber qué sabías y cuándo lo supiste.

english: I'd like to be left alone for a while, if you don't mind.
spanish: Me gustaría estar a solas un momento, si no te importa.

english: I'll look over your essay as soon as I can find the time.
spanish: Revisaré tu ensayo apenas encuentre tiempo.

english: I'll see to it that you get a raise after the first year.
spanish: Me encargaré de que usted obtenga un aumento después del primer año.

english: I'll teach you how to play the ukulele if you want me to.
spanish: Si quieres, te enseñaré a tocar el ukelele.

english: I'll tell you only if you promise to keep it to yourself.
spanish: Te lo contaré sólo si me prometes que lo mantendrás en secreto.

english: I'm going to take a break now. I feel a little burnt out.
spanish: Voy a tomar un descanso ahora. Me siento un poco agotado.

english: I'm having trouble with my roommate. He eats all my food.
spanish: Tengo problemas con mi compañero de cuarto. Él se come toda mi comida.

english: I'm looking forward to visiting my sister in Los Angeles.
spanish: Espero con ganas a visitar a mi hermana a Los Ángeles.

english: I'm looking forward to visiting your country this winter.
spanish: Espero con ganas a visitar tu país este invierno.

english: I'm not a mind reader. You need to tell me what you want.
spanish: No sé leer la mente. Tienes que decirme qué quieres.

english: I'm so tired that I'm going to bed as soon as I get home.
spanish: Estoy tan cansado que me iré a la cama apenas llegue a la casa.

english: I've never met someone that I love as much as I love you.
spanish: Nunca he conocido a nadie a quien yo ame tanto como te amo a ti.

english: I've spent way too much time thinking about this problem.
spanish: He pasado demasiado tiempo pensando sobre este problema.

english: If a nuclear war were to break out, mankind would perish.
spanish: Si una guerra nuclear se desatara, la humanidad perecería.

english: If he calls, tell him I will get in touch with him later.
spanish: Si llama, dile que me pondré en contacto con él más tarde.

english: If it were not for the sun, every living thing would die.
spanish: Si no fuera por el sol, todos los seres vivos morirían.

english: If it were not for water, human life would be impossible.
spanish: Si no fuera por el agua, la vida humana sería imposible.

english: If it weren't for music, the world would be a dull place.
spanish: Si no fuese por la música, el mundo sería un lugar aburrido.

english: If more people had voted, we would have won the election.
spanish: Si más personas hubieran votado, habríamos ganado la elección.

english: If something goes wrong, just blame it on the translator.
spanish: Si algo va mal, simplemente échale la culpa al traductor.

english: If there's anything I can do for you, please let me know.
spanish: Si hay algo que pueda hacer por ti, dímelo, por favor.

english: If there's anything I can do to help, please let me know.
spanish: Si hay algo que pueda hacer para ayudar, por favor, háganmelo saber.

english: If there's anything urgent, you can get in touch with me.
spanish: Si hay algo urgente, puedes ponerte en contacto conmigo.

english: If what you say is true, it follows that he has an alibi.
spanish: Si lo que tú dices es verdad, lo natural es que él tenga una coartada.

english: If you cheat on me again, I definitely won't forgive you.
spanish: Si me engañas otra vez, definitivamente no te perdonaré

english: If you didn't want to come, you should've said something.
spanish: Si no querías venir, deberías haber dicho algo.

english: If you do not have this program, you can download it now.
spanish: Si usted no dispone de este programa puede descargarlo ahora.

english: If you do such a foolish thing, people will laugh at you.
spanish: Si haces algo así de estúpido, se burlarán de ti.

english: If you don't want to go to that party, you don't have to.
spanish: No tienes que ir a esa fiesta si no quieres.

english: If you flunk this exam, you'll have to repeat the course.
spanish: Si suspendes este examen, tendrás que repetir curso.

spanish: Tom preguntó a Mary con quién estaba ella planeando ir a Boston.

english: Tom boasts of never having been defeated in a horse race.
spanish: Tom se jacta de nunca haber sido derrotado en una carrera a caballo.

english: Tom bought a piece of land not far from where Mary lives.
spanish: Tom compró un terreno cerca de donde vive Mary.

english: Tom came to France with the intention of studying French.
spanish: Tom vino a Francia con la intención de estudiar francés.

english: Tom caught a mosquito between his thumb and first finger.
spanish: Tom atrapó un mosquito entre su pulgar y su índice.

english: Tom did a good job predicting who would win the election.
spanish: Tom hizo un buen trabajo pronosticando quien ganaría la elección.

english: Tom didn't even have enough money to buy a cup of coffee.
spanish: Tom ni siquiera tenía suficiente dinero para comprar una taza de café.

english: Tom didn't expect Mary to finish her homework so quickly.
spanish: Tom no esperaba que Mary acabara tan rápido su tarea.

english: Tom didn't know that Mary's house was so close to John's.
spanish: Tom no sabía que la casa de Mary estuviera tan cerca de la de John.

english: Tom didn't seem to understand the purpose of the project.
spanish: Tom no parecía comprender el propósito del proyecto.

english: Tom died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head.
spanish: Tom murió de una herida de bala auto-infligida en la cabeza.

english: Tom doesn't get along with his neighbors like he used to.
spanish: Tom no se lleva bien con sus vecinos como antes.

english: Tom doesn't have a very good Japanese-English dictionary.
spanish: Tom no tiene un diccionario japonés-inglés muy bueno.

english: Tom doesn't have to worry. Nothing bad's going to happen.
spanish: Tom no necesita preocuparse. Nada malo va a pasar.

english: Tom doesn't understand why Mary behaves the way she does.
spanish: Tom no entiende por qué Mary se comporta de la manera que lo hace.

english: Tom earned money by playing his guitar on street corners.
spanish: Tom se ganaba la vida tocando la guitarra en las esquinas.

english: Tom got some chewing gum stuck on the bottom of his shoe.
spanish: A Tom se le pegó un poco de chicle en la suela del zapato.

english: Tom had some gum stuck on the bottom of one of his shoes.
spanish: Tom tenía un pedazo de chicle pegado en la suela de uno de sus zapatos.

english: Tom had to take care of Mary's son while she was working.
spanish: Tom tuvo que cuidar al hijo de Mary mientras ella trabajaba.

english: Tom hadn't expected Mary to come so early in the morning.
spanish: Tom no esperaba que María viniera tan temprano por la mañana.

english: Tom has an important decision to make before next Monday.
spanish: Tom tiene una importante decisión que hacer antes del próximo lunes.

english: Tom hoped the rain would stop before he had to walk home.
spanish: Tom esperaba que la lluvia amainara antes que tuviera que caminar a casa.

english: Tom hopes Mary can come over to his house this afternoon.
spanish: Tom espera que Mary pueda venir a su casa esta tarde.

english: Tom hopes he doesn't become a workaholic like his father.
spanish: Tom espera no convertirse en un adicto al trabajo como su padre.

english: Tom hopes to inherit a lot of money when his mother dies.
spanish: Tom espera heredar mucho dinero cuando su madre muera.

english: Tom hung the three pairs of wet jeans on the clothesline.
spanish: Tom colgó los tres pares de jeans húmedos en el tendedero.

english: Tom is convinced that his mother doesn't want to eat now.
spanish: Tom está convencido de que su madre no quiere comer ahora.

english: Tom is honest and expects other people to be honest, too.
spanish: Tom es honesto y espera que los demás sean honestos también.

english: Tom keeps an extra pair of shoes in the trunk of his car.
spanish: Tom lleva un par de zapatos extra en el baúl de su coche.

english: Tom keeps an extra pair of shoes in the trunk of his car.
spanish: Tom conserva un par de zapatos extra en el maletero de su auto.

english: Tom knows everything there is to know about Italian cars.
spanish: Tom sabe todo lo que hay que saber sobre autos italianos.

english: Tom lives in a small town where nobody locks their doors.
spanish: Tom vive en una pequeña ciudad en donde nadie le pone llave a sus puertas.

english: Tom looked around to make sure no one was looking at him.
spanish: Tom miró a su alrededor para asegurarse de que nadie le estuviera mirando.

english: Tom loses his temper so easily that everybody avoids him.
spanish: Tom pierde tan fácil el temperamento que todos lo evitan.

english: Tom made a list of things he wanted to do before he died.
spanish: Tom hizo una lista de cosas que quería hacer antes de morir.

english: Tom made a promise to Mary that he would never leave her.
spanish: Tom le prometió a Mary que nunca la dejaría.

english: Tom never fails to send a birthday present to his father.
spanish: A Tom nunca se le olvida enviarle un regalo de cumpleaños a su padre.

english: Tom only had a dim recollection of what Mary looked like.
spanish: Tom sólo tenía un tenue recuerdo de cómo era María.

english: Tom says he can pluck a chicken in less than ten minutes.
spanish: Tom dice que puede desplumar un pollo en menos de diez minutos.

english: Tom says he can't put up with Mary's behavior any longer.
spanish: Tom dice que no aguanta más el comportamiento de Mary.

english: Tom seems to be able to sense when someone is in trouble.
spanish: Tom parece ser capaz de sentir cuándo alguien tiene problemas.

english: Tom seems to be able to sense when someone is in trouble.
spanish: Tom parece capaz de intuir cuándo alguien tiene problemas.

english: Tom should go to see Mary in the hospital this afternoon.
spanish: Tom debería ir a visitar a Mary al hospital esta tarde.

english: Tom swept the kitchen floor while Mary washed the dishes.
spanish: Tom barría el piso de la cocina, mientras Mary lavaba los platos.

english: Tom thought it was rude to talk to Mary the way John did.
spanish: Tom creía que era grosero hablar a Mary del modo en que lo hizo John.

english: Tom thought that he could count on Mary to do a good job.
spanish: Tom pensó que él podría contar con Mary para hacer un buen trabajo.

english: Tom told Mary everything he knew about what had happened.
spanish: Tom le contó a Mary todo lo que sabía sobre lo que había pasado.

english: Tom told Mary everything he knew about what had happened.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary todo lo que sabía sobre lo que había ocurrido.

english: Tom told Mary not to blame herself for what had happened.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que no se culpara por lo que había pasado.

english: Tom took a folded piece of paper out of his shirt pocket.
spanish: Tom sacó un papel doblado del bolsillo de su camisa.

english: Tom took a picture of Mary's new car and sent it to John.
spanish: Tom sacó una foto del coche nuevo de Mary y se la envió a John.

english: Tom took a picture of his old camera with his new camera.
spanish: Tom sacó una foto de su antigua cámara con su cámara nueva.

english: Tom took a picture of his old camera with his new camera.
spanish: Tom hizo una foto de su cámara vieja con su cámara nueva.

english: Tom waited a long time for Mary, but she never showed up.
spanish: Tom esperó un largo tiempo a Mary, pero nunca apareció.

english: Tom was accused of stealing money from the cash register.
spanish: Tom fue acusado de robar dinero de la caja registradora.

english: Tom was going to lie, but he ended up spilling the beans.
spanish: Tom iba a mentir, pero acabó soltando la lengua.

english: Tom was the first one to recognize Mary's musical talent.
spanish: Tom fue el primero en reconocer el don para la música de María.

english: Tom will likely be discharged from the hospital tomorrow.
spanish: Tom muy probablemente sea dado de alta del hospital mañana.

english: Tom will likely be discharged from the hospital tomorrow.
spanish: Es probable que a Tom le den el alta mañana.

english: Tom, who had been working all day, wanted to have a rest.
spanish: Tom, que había estado trabajando todo el día, quería descansar.

english: Tsunamis swept through rice fields and flooded the towns.
spanish: El tsunami se extendió por los campos de arroz e inundó los poblados.

english: We could see the reflection of the mountains in the lake.
spanish: Podíamos ver el reflejo de las montañas en el lago.

english: We got to know each other rather well on our recent trip.
spanish: Nos llegamos a conocer bien en un viaje reciente.

english: We have something very important that we have to discuss.
spanish: Hay algo muy importante de lo que tenemos que conversar.

english: We have something very important that we need to discuss.
spanish: Hay algo muy importante de lo que tenemos que conversar.

english: We haven't seen much of Tom since Mary committed suicide.
spanish: No hemos visto mucho a Tom desde que Mary cometió suicidio.

english: We import raw materials and export the finished products.
spanish: Importamos materia prima y exportamos los productos terminados.

english: We listened carefully in order not to miss a single word.
spanish: Escuchamos atentamente para no perdernos ni una palabra.

english: We often hear it said that the Japanese are good workers.
spanish: A menudo oímos decir que los japoneses son buenos trabajadores.

english: We took it for granted that he would approve of the plan.
spanish: Dimos por hecho que aprobaría el plan.

english: We want an assistant, preferably someone with experience.
spanish: Buscamos un asistente, preferiblemente alguien con experiencia.

english: We would like to report about the latest trends in Japan.
spanish: Nos gustaría informar sobre las últimas tendencias en Japón.

english: We would like to visit Nikko during this summer vacation.
spanish: Nos gustaría visitar a Nikko durante estas vacaciones de verano.

english: We'd better get ready early because the train won't wait.
spanish: Hay que alistarse temprano porque el tren no espera.

english: We're a bit busy at the moment. Can you hang on a minute?
spanish: Estamos un poco ocupados por el momento, ¿Podés esperar un minuto?

english: We're a bit busy at the moment. Can you hang on a minute?
spanish: Ahora mismo estamos un poco ocupados, ¿puede esperar un minuto?

english: We're a bit busy at the moment. Can you hang on a minute?
spanish: Ahora mismo estamos un poco ocupadas, ¿podéis esperar un minuto?

english: We're not so young that we don't understand what love is.
spanish: Ya no somos tan jóvenes así que no entendemos lo que es el amor.

english: We're not so young that we don't understand what love is.
spanish: No somos tan jóvenes como para no saber qué es el amor.

english: We've got to talk to Tom before he does something stupid.
spanish: Debemos hablar con Tom antes de que haga algo estúpido.

english: What changes the world is communication, not information.
spanish: Lo que cambia el mundo es la comunicación, no la información.

english: What do you think is the most popular sport in Australia?
spanish: ¿Cuál crees que es el deporte más popular de Australia?

english: What do you think is the most popular sport in Australia?
spanish: ¿Cuál te piensas que es el deporte más popular en Australia?

english: What does it matter how they bring up their own children?
spanish: ¿Qué importa cómo ellos críen a sus hijos?

english: What have you done with my pen? It was here a minute ago.
spanish: ¿Qué has hecho con mi boli? Estaba aquí hace un minuto.

english: What language do you use when you talk with your parents?
spanish: ¿Qué idioma usás cuando hablás con tus padres?

english: What language do you use when you talk with your parents?
spanish: ¿Qué idioma usa cuando habla con sus padres?

english: What seems easy at first often turns out to be difficult.
spanish: Lo que parece fácil al principio frecuentemente se vuelve difícil.

english: What with the heat and the humidity, I didn't sleep well.
spanish: Que con el calor y la humedad, no dormí bien.

english: What you want and what you need are two different things.
spanish: Lo que querés y lo que necesitás son dos cosas distintas.

english: When I didn't have any money, I only had a rug for a bed.
spanish: Cuando no tenía plata, solo tenía una alfombra como cama.

english: When I was a boy, I thought that I wanted to be a doctor.
spanish: Cuando era niño, pensaba que quería ser médico.

english: When she returned to her room, the diamond ring was gone.
spanish: Cuando ella regresó a su habitación, el anillo de diamantes había desaparecido.

english: When the judge speaks, everyone in the courtroom listens.
spanish: Cuando el juez habla, todos los que están en la sala escuchan.

english: When they got to the station, the train had already left.
spanish: Cuando llegaron a la estación, el tren ya se había ido.

english: When you feel tired, there is nothing like having a bath.
spanish: Cuando estás cansado, no hay nada como tomar un baño.

english: When you get to be my age, you'll understand what I mean.
spanish: Cuando tengas mi edad, vas a entender de qué hablo.

english: Which language is spoken in the United States of America?
spanish: ¿Qué idioma se habla en los Estados Unidos?

english: Which language is spoken in the United States of America?
spanish: ¿Qué lengua se habla en los Estados Unidos de América?

english: Which language is spoken in the United States of America?
spanish: ¿Qué lengua se habla en E.U.A.?

english: While we're waiting, why don't you tell me what happened?
spanish: Mientras estamos esperando, ¿por qué no me dices qué pasó?

english: Who do you think was watching TV in this room last night?
spanish: ¿Quién piensas que estaba viendo la televisión en esta habitación ayer por la noche?

english: Who was it that forgot to lock the door of the warehouse?
spanish: ¿Quién ha sido que olvidó cerrar con llave la puerta del almacén?

english: Whoever leaves the office last should turn off the light.
spanish: El que se salga último de la oficina tiene que apagar la luz.

english: Willingness to take responsibility is a sign of maturity.
spanish: La buena disposición a tomar responsabilidad es una señal de madurez.

english: With the exception of him, nobody else came to the party.
spanish: Nadie, excepto él, vino a la fiesta.

english: Would it be ethical to sacrifice one person to save many?
spanish: ¿Sería ético sacrificar a una persona para salvar a muchas?

english: You can come and see me whenever it's convenient for you.
spanish: Puedes venir a verme cuando te venga bien.

english: You can save your breath. There is no use talking to him.
spanish: Puedes ahorrarte el aliento. No tiene caso hablar con él.

english: You can save your breath. There is no use talking to him.
spanish: No merece la pena. No tiene sentido hablar con él.

english: You catch more flies with honey than you do with vinegar.
spanish: Se atrapan más moscas con miel que con vinagre.

english: You don't have to make a different dish for every person.
spanish: No hay que preparar un plato diferente para cada persona.

english: You have changed so much that I can hardly recognize you.
spanish: Has cambiado tanto que me cuesta reconocerte.

english: You have no right to interfere in other people's affairs.
spanish: No tienes derecho a interferir en los asuntos de otras personas.

english: You have wanted to go there for a long time, haven't you?
spanish: Has querido ir allí durante mucho tiempo, ¿no?

english: You may only borrow my camera if you are careful with it.
spanish: Sólo te dejo la cámara si tienes cuidado con ella.

english: You must decide whether you will go by train or by plane.
spanish: Tienes que decidir si vas a ir en tren o en avión.

english: You must take into account the fact that he is too young.
spanish: Debes tener en cuenta el hecho de que él es demasiado joven.

english: You should have told me that you wanted me to come alone.
spanish: Debiste haberme dicho que querías que yo viniera solo.

english: You should not lose your patience when dealing with kids.
spanish: Tú no debes perder la paciencia cuando tratas con niños.

english: You want me to get a better job, but I don't think I can.
spanish: Tú quieres que consiga un mejor trabajo, pero no creo que pueda.

english: You'd be amazed how few students finished their homework.
spanish: Te sorprendería el número de estudiantes que acabaron los deberes.

english: You'll be in charge of the women working in this factory.
spanish: Usted estará al cargo de la mujer que trabaja en esta fábrica.

english: You're the only person who ever calls me after 10:00 p.m.
spanish: Eres la única persona que me llama después de las diez de la noche.

english: You've got to listen a little more carefully from now on.
spanish: Tienes que escuchar con un poco más de cuidado a partir de ahora.

english: "Do you mind if I call on you sometime?" "No, not at all."
spanish: "¿Te importa si te llamo de vez en cuando?" "No, para nada."

english: "How are you feeling this morning?" "Pretty good, thanks."
spanish: "¿Cómo te sientes esta mañana?" "Bastante bien, gracias."

english: "What would you like to buy?" "I would like to buy a dog."
spanish: "¿Qué te gustaría comprar?" "Me gustaría comprar un perro."

english: A ball hit the back of my head while I was playing soccer.
spanish: Una pelota me pegó en la nuca mientras jugaba fútbol.

english: A big bomb fell, and a great many people lost their lives.
spanish: Cayó una gran bomba y muchísimas personas murieron.

english: A bird can glide through the air without moving its wings.
spanish: Un pájaro puede planear por el aire sin agitar sus alas.

english: A bottle of shampoo costs as much as a tube of toothpaste.
spanish: Un frasco de champú cuesta tanto como un tubo de pasta dentífrica.

english: A friend of mine is looking for someone who speaks French.
spanish: Un amigo mío está buscando a alguien que sepa hablar francés.

english: A monument has been erected to the memory of the deceased.
spanish: Se erigió un monumento en memoria de los difuntos.

english: A nuclear war will bring about the destruction of mankind.
spanish: Una guerra nuclear traerá la destrucción de la humanidad.

english: A party is a good place to make friends with other people.
spanish: Una fiesta es un buen lugar para hacer amistad con otras personas.

english: A party is a good place to make friends with other people.
spanish: Una fiesta es un buen lugar para hacer amistades.

english: According to the Bible, God created the world in six days.
spanish: Según la Biblia, Dios creó el mundo en seis días.

english: All communication with that airplane was suddenly cut off.
spanish: De repente se cortó toda comunicación con el avión.

english: All you have to do is to write your name and address here.
spanish: Todo lo que tienes que hacer es escribir aquí tu nombre y dirección.

english: An arrest warrant was issued for the company's accountant.
spanish: Se emitió una orden de detención contra el contable de la compañía.

english: Antonio Guzmán Blanco came to power in Venezuela in 1870.
spanish: Antonio Guzmás Blanco ascendió al poder en Venezuela en 1870.

english: Are you going to play tricks on me again, you naughty boy?
spanish: ¿Vas a jugarme una broma otra vez, niño travieso?

english: As everyone knows, today is a very significant day for us.
spanish: Como todos saben, el día de hoy es un día muy importante para nosotros.

english: As far as I know, she has nothing to do with that scandal.
spanish: Hasta donde yo sé, ella no tiene nada que ver con el escándalo.

english: As soon as I can get the chance, I'll send you some money.
spanish: Tan pronto tenga la oportunidad, te enviaré algo de dinero.

english: As soon as he got off the train, he was met by his cousin.
spanish: Tan pronto como se apeó del tren, se encontró con su primo.

english: As soon as he heard the crash, he rushed out of the house.
spanish: Tan pronto como oyó el choque, salió corriendo de su casa.

english: Benjamin Franklin was an American politician and inventor.
spanish: Benjamín Franklin fue un político e inventor estadounidense.

english: Blondes earn 7% more than women with any other hair color.
spanish: Las rubias ganan un 7% más que las mujeres con cualquier otro color de cabello.

english: Blondes earn 7% more than women with any other hair color.
spanish: Las güeras ganan un 7% más que las mujeres con cualquier otro color de pelo.

english: Can you help me to translate these sentences into Chinese?
spanish: ¿Me puedes ayudar a traducir estas frases a chino?

english: Clerks with sticky fingers won't keep their jobs for long.
spanish: Los oficinistas de manos largas no mantendrán sus puestos por mucho tiempo.

english: Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work.
spanish: Los computadores son capaces de realizar trabajo extremadamente complicado.

english: Do you know how many years Tom and Mary have been married?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuantos años llevan casados Tom and Mary?

english: Do you know how to start a fire using just sticks of wood?
spanish: ¿Sabes prender fuego usando solo palos de madera?

english: Do you know how to start a fire using just sticks of wood?
spanish: ¿Sabes encender fuego usando solo palos de madera?

english: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?
spanish: ¿Realmente necesitas preguntar para saber la respuesta?

english: Do you think that eating breakfast every day is important?
spanish: ¿Tú crees que desayunar todos los días es importante?

english: Do you usually eat more than five slices of pizza a month?
spanish: ¿Normalmente comes más de cinco trozos de pizza al mes?

english: Does he still have that book he borrowed from the library?
spanish: ¿Todavía tiene ese libro que cogió de la biblioteca?

english: Don't be afraid of making mistakes when you speak English.
spanish: No tengas miedo de cometer errores cuando hables en inglés.

english: Don't believe him. He's just talking to hear himself talk.
spanish: No le creas, habla por hablar.

english: Even though I was sitting in the sun, I still felt chilly.
spanish: Aunque estaba sentado al sol, seguía teniendo frío.

english: Even though it was raining, they went on their field trip.
spanish: Aún cuando estaba lloviendo, ellos fueron de excursión.

english: Every day, my brother borrows a new book from the library.
spanish: Mi hermano pide prestado un libro nuevo de la biblioteca, todos los días.

english: Everyone needs someone to turn to when they're in trouble.
spanish: Todos necesitan a alguien a quién acudir cuando están en problemas.

english: Examinations interfere with the real purpose of education.
spanish: Las pruebas obstaculizan el verdadero propósito de la educación.

english: Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities. Truth isn't.
spanish: La ficción está obligada a apegarse a las posibilidades. La verdad no.

english: Fortunately, the shark bite didn't hit any major arteries.
spanish: Afortunadamente, la mordedura de tiburón no dañó ninguna arteria principal.

english: Gulliver's Travels was written by a famous English writer.
spanish: Los Viajes de Gulliver fueron escritos por un famoso escritor inglés.

english: Happiness isn't the destination, happiness is the journey.
spanish: La felicidad no es el objetivo, si no que el camino.

english: Have you told everyone when and where the meeting will be?
spanish: ¿Les dijiste a todos cuándo y dónde será la siguiente reunión?

english: Having done my homework, I could finally watch television.
spanish: Habiendo terminado mis deberes, pude finalmente ver la televisión.

english: He could always tell which direction the wind was blowing.
spanish: Siempre podía decir en qué dirección soplaba el viento.

english: He couldn't sleep because of the noise outside his window.
spanish: Él no podía dormir por el ruido afuera de su ventana.

english: He failed in the attempt to sail across the Pacific Ocean.
spanish: Fracasó en el intento de navegar cruzando el océano Pacífico.

english: He fell into a deep depression and decided to off himself.
spanish: Cayó en una profunda depresión y decidió ultimarse.

english: He gave up traveling abroad because of his sudden illness.
spanish: Dejó de viajar al extranjero por causa de una enfermedad repentina.

english: He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.
spanish: Le retiraron el carné de conducir debido a su conducción temeraria.

english: He had to undergo an operation immediately after his fall.
spanish: Después de la caída hubo que hacerle una rápida intervención.

english: He is a man of his word, so if he said he'd help, he will.
spanish: Es hombre de palabra, de modo que, si dijo que ayudaría, lo hará.

english: He passed away several days before his hundredth birthday.
spanish: Él murió un par de días antes de su cumpleaños número cien.

english: He suddenly hit on a good idea while he was taking a bath.
spanish: De repente se le ocurrió una buena idea mientras estaba dándose un baño.

english: Her clothes are the best advertisement for her dressmaker.
spanish: Su ropa es la mejor publicidad para su modista.

english: Her neighbor will care for the children while she is away.
spanish: Su vecino cuidará a los niños mientras ella está fuera.

english: Here is her letter asking us to take care of her only son.
spanish: Aquí está su carta pidiéndonos que nos hagamos cargo de su único hijo.

english: His departure means that there will be peace in the house.
spanish: Su partida significa que habrá paz en la casa.

english: His ideas are too radical to be acceptable to most people.
spanish: Sus ideas son demasiado radicales para que les resulten aceptables a la mayoría de la gente.

english: His unique perspective helped shed light on the situation.
spanish: Su perspectiva única ayudó a arrojar luz sobre la situación.

english: How many times a week do you go shopping at a supermarket?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces por semana vas de compras al supermercado?

english: How much beer people drink largely depends on the weather.
spanish: Qué tanta cerveza tome la gente depende en buena parte del clima.

english: How old were you when you fell in love for the first time?
spanish: ¿Qué edad tenías cuando te enamoraste por primera vez?

english: Hundreds of people were waiting outside the ticket office.
spanish: Cientos de personas estaban esperando afuera de la taquilla.

english: I am saving money in order to buy a new personal computer.
spanish: Estoy ahorrando dinero para comprar un notebook nuevo.

english: I can often hear pigeons cooing outside my bedroom window.
spanish: A menudo oigo a las palomas arrullar desde la ventana de mi habitación

english: I can often hear pigeons cooing outside my bedroom window.
spanish: A menudo puedo oír el arrullo de las palomas a través de la ventana de mi habitación

english: I can see you're not as open-minded as I thought you were.
spanish: Ya veo que no tienes la mente tan abierta como yo pensaba.

english: I can't count the number of times I've heard Tom say that.
spanish: No puedo contar el número de veces que oí a Tom decir eso.

english: I can't find Tom. He hasn't already gone and left, has he?
spanish: No encuentro a Tom. Él aún no se ha marchado, ¿no?

english: I couldn't even understand the main point of what he said.
spanish: No pude entender ni siquiera el punto esencial de lo que dijo.

english: I couldn't leave you alone to face the danger by yourself.
spanish: No podía dejar que te enfrentaras al peligro solo.

english: I did not learn everything I need to know in kindergarten.
spanish: No aprendí todo lo que necesitaba saber en el jardín infantil.

english: I didn't like rock music at first, but it soon grew on me.
spanish: No me gustó la música rock en un principio, pero de a poco me empezó a gustar.

english: I do not think he will ever get over the loss of his wife.
spanish: No creo que él logre recuperarse algún día de la pérdida de su esposa.

english: I don't care what he says. I will never believe him again.
spanish: No me importa lo que dice, nunca volveré a creer en él.

english: I don't know how long it takes to get to Boston from here.
spanish: No sé cuánto se tarda en llegar a Boston desde aquí.

english: I don't know how things were a hundred or fifty years ago.
spanish: Yo no sé cómo eran las cosas hace cien o cincuenta años atrás.

english: I don't know who Tom was with and I don't want to ask him.
spanish: No sé con quién estaba Tom y no quiero preguntarle.

english: I don't think I'll be able to hold in my anger any longer.
spanish: No creo que sea capaz de contener mi ira por más tiempo.

english: I don't think you're going to need me to help you anymore.
spanish: Creo que ya no vas a necesitar que te ayude.

english: I don't want Tom to be in the room while I'm on the phone.
spanish: No quiero que Tom esté en la habitación mientras estoy al teléfono.

english: I don't want to be intrusive, but is everything all right?
spanish: No quiero sonar entrometido, pero ¿está todo bien?

english: I don't want to go and I know you don't want to go either.
spanish: No quiero ir, y sé que tú tampoco quieres.

english: I don't want to spend my vacations locked inside my house.
spanish: No quiero pasar las vacaciones encerrada en casa.

english: I finally overcame my shyness and asked him out on a date.
spanish: Finalmente vencí mi timidez y le pregunté si quería salir conmigo.

english: I forgot to turn off the television before going to sleep.
spanish: Me olvidé de apagar la televisión antes de ir a dormir.

english: I had a valid visa, so I was allowed to enter the country.
spanish: Yo tenía una visa válida, así que pude entrar al país.

english: I had been reading a magazine for some time when she came.
spanish: Había estado leyendo revistas por un tiempo cuando ella vino.

english: I had been up all night trying to finish the presentation.
spanish: He estado toda la noche levantado tratando de terminar la presentación.

english: I had hoped that my mother would live until I got married.
spanish: Tenía la esperanza de que mi madre viviera hasta que yo contrajera matrimonio.

english: I have a feeling that Tom doesn't like Mary all that much.
spanish: Tengo la sensación de que a Tom no le gusta tanto Mary.

english: I have a lot of flowers. Some are red and some are yellow.
spanish: Tengo muchas flores. Algunas son rojas y otras son amarillas.

english: I have a lot of flowers. Some are red and some are yellow.
spanish: Tengo muchas flores. Algunas son rojas y otras amarillas.

english: I have no choice but to take the red-eye back to New York.
spanish: No me queda más remedio que coger el vuelo nocturno de regreso a Nueva York.

english: I have so many clothes I don't know what to wear tomorrow.
spanish: Tengo tanta ropa que no sé qué ponerme mañana.

english: I heard a strange noise coming from Tom's room last night.
spanish: Anoche oí un extraño ruido venir de la habitación de Tom.

english: I hope that I will be able to help you at some other time.
spanish: Espero que pueda ayudarte en otra ocasión.

english: I hope you washed that apple before you started eating it.
spanish: Espero que hayas lavado esa manzana antes de empezar a comerla.

english: I knew he was angry, but I didn't think he was that angry.
spanish: Sabía que él estaba enojado, pero no había pensado que él estaría así de enojado.

english: I know a very rich girl who only eats seasonal vegetables.
spanish: Conozco a una chica muy rica que come siempre solo verdura de estación.

english: I know that I'm supposed to enjoy this class, but I don't.
spanish: Sé que se supone que yo disfrutara esta clase, pero no.

english: I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone can help me.
spanish: Sé que es muy improbable que cualquiera pueda ayudarme.

english: I like him, but at the same time I don't really trust him.
spanish: Me agrada él, pero al mismo tiempo no confío realmente en él.

english: I lived in Tokyo a few years ago, but now I live in Kyoto.
spanish: Yo viví en Tokio hace unos años atrás, pero ahora vivo en Kioto.

english: I met my teacher by accident at the restaurant last night.
spanish: Me encontré con mi profesor en el restaurante por casualidad ayer por la noche.

english: I needed a lot of courage to try eating that strange food.
spanish: Necesité mucho coraje para tratar de comer esa extraña comida.

english: I never thought it'd be this hard to build a picnic table.
spanish: Nunca pensé que sería así de difícil construir una mesa de picnic.

english: I really don't understand what all the commotion is about.
spanish: Yo en realidad no entiendo a que viene toda la conmoción.

english: I should be studying English, but I want to watch a movie.
spanish: Debería estar estudiando inglés, pero quiero ir a ver una película.

english: I suggest we eat just a little now, and then go out later.
spanish: Sugiero que ahora solo comamos un poco, y más tarde salgamos.

english: I take for granted that you will be coming to the meeting.
spanish: Doy por hecho que estarás viniendo a la reunión.

english: I think Tom doesn't have the ability to solve the problem.
spanish: Creo que Tom no tiene la capacidad de resolver el problema.

english: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom will drink any beer.
spanish: Creo que es altamente improbable que Tom beba algo de cerveza.

english: I think skateboards are usually cheaper than rollerblades.
spanish: Me parece que las patinetas en general son más baratas que los patines.

english: I think you and Tom are more alike than you want to admit.
spanish: Yo pienso que tú y Tom son más parecidos de lo que quieres admitir.

english: I thought Tom would plant those flowers near the oak tree.
spanish: Pensé que Tom plantaría esas flores cerca del roble.

english: I thought you'd like to know who's coming over for dinner.
spanish: Pensé que te gustaría saber quién va a venir a cenar.

english: I used to think it didn't really matter what I fed my dog.
spanish: Yo solía pensar que no importaba que le diera de comer a mi perro.

english: I want Tom to know why I couldn't come to visit him today.
spanish: Quiero que Tom sepa porque no pude ir a visitarlo hoy.

english: I want everything you just said written into the contract.
spanish: Quiero que todo lo que acabas de decir salga escrito en el contrato.

english: I want the two of you to try to get along with each other.
spanish: Quiero que ustedes dos traten de llevarse bien.

english: I want to find out the source of this irresponsible rumor.
spanish: Quiero averiguar el origen de este irresponsable rumor.

english: I want to get a satisfactory explanation for your conduct.
spanish: Quiero una explicación satisfactoria para tu conducta.

english: I want to know if you can go fishing with us next weekend.
spanish: Quiero saber si puedes ir a pescar con nosotros el próximo fin de semana.

english: I want to spend more time doing things that make me happy.
spanish: Quiero pasar más tiempo haciendo cosas que me hagan feliz.

english: I want to split up, but I know I couldn't even if I tried.
spanish: Quiero romper, pero sé que no podría aunque lo intentara.

english: I was able to finish the work earlier than I had expected.
spanish: Fui capaz de terminar el trabajo antes de lo que había esperado.

english: I was in favor of going and they were in favor of staying.
spanish: Yo estaba por ir y ellos por quedarse.

english: I was just wondering how often this kind of thing happens.
spanish: Justo me estaba preguntando qué tan a menudo suceden esta clase de cosas.

english: I was told that you could teach me how to sharpen a knife.
spanish: Me dijeron que tú me podías enseñar cómo afilar un cuchillo.

english: I won't unload the car because that's somebody else's job.
spanish: No quiero descargar el coche porque ese es el trabajo de otro.

english: I wonder if he can lend me his guitar during the vacation.
spanish: Me pregunto si me prestará la guitarra durante las vacaciones.

english: I would have written a longer letter if I'd had more time.
spanish: Habría escrito una carta más larga si hubiera tenido más tiempo.

english: I would have written a longer letter if I'd had more time.
spanish: De haber tenido más tiempo habría escrito una carta más larga.

english: I would scream very loudly if I saw a scorpion in my room.
spanish: Gritaría muy fuerte si viera un escorpión en mi habitación.

english: I wouldn't be too surprised if Tom didn't show up on time.
spanish: Yo no estaría muy sorprendido si Tom no se mostrara a tiempo.

english: I wouldn't want Tom as a friend because he's very selfish.
spanish: Jamás querría a Tom como amigo, porque él es muy egoísta.

english: I'd be lying if I said I haven't thought about doing that.
spanish: Estaría mintiendo si dijera que no he pensado en hacerlo.

english: I'd like this meeting to last no more than twenty minutes.
spanish: Me gustaría que esta reunión no durara más de veinte minutos.

english: I'd like to have a single room with a bath for two nights.
spanish: Quiero una habitación individual con baño por dos noches.

english: I'd like to have this meat dish with your best white wine.
spanish: Yo preferiría servirme este plato de carne con su mejor vino blanco.

english: I'd like to spend less time at work and more time at home.
spanish: Me gustaría pasar menos tiempo en el trabajo y más tiempo en casa.

english: I'll expect you tomorrow unless you let me know otherwise.
spanish: Le espero mañana a menos que usted me avise.

english: I'll explain the reason in the fifth chapter of this book.
spanish: Explicaré la razón en el quinto capítulo de este libro.

english: I'll work for you as long as you keep paying me this well.
spanish: Trabajaré para ti mientras me sigas pagando así de bien.

english: I'm going to get ready for the final exams this afternoon.
spanish: Voy a prepararme para los exámenes finales esta tarde.

english: I'm in the middle of something. Could you come back later?
spanish: Estoy en medio de algo. ¿Podrías volver más tarde?

english: I'm sorry I wasn't able to see you when you came by today.
spanish: Lamento no haber podido verte cuando pasaste por acá hoy.

english: I've just been told that I have to bring my own equipment.
spanish: Me acaban de decir que debo traer mi propio equipo.

english: I've only been here for a day and I already want to leave.
spanish: Sólo llevo aquí un día y ya quiero marcharme.

english: I've only been here for a day and I already want to leave.
spanish: No llevo aquí más que un día y ya quiero irme.

english: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
spanish: Si Dios no existiera, habría que inventarlo.

english: If UFOs were to attack the earth, what would become of us?
spanish: Si los OVNIs fueran a atacar la Tierra, ¿qué sería de nosotros?

english: If it were to rain tomorrow, the match would be postponed.
spanish: Si fuera a llover mañana, el juego se pospondría.

english: If it weren't for the climate, I'd like it here very much.
spanish: Si no fuera por el clima, me gustaría un montón quedarme aquí.

english: If the child needs to eat, cook something healthy for him.
spanish: Si el niño necesita comer, cocinale algo saludable.

english: If you go anywhere, you had better tell your mother first.
spanish: Si vas a algún sitio, mejor díselo a tu madre antes.

english: If you happen to see him, please give him my best regards.
spanish: Si da la casualidad de que le ves, por favor transmítele mis mejores deseos.

english: If you leave now, you'll be in Boston by tomorrow evening.
spanish: Si te vas ahora, estarás en Boston mañana por la tarde.

english: If you want me to wear those boots, I'll wear those boots.
spanish: Si quieres que me ponga esas botas, me pondré esas botas.

english: If you want to do that, I'm not going to try and stop you.
spanish: Si quieres hacer eso, no voy a tratar de detenerte.

english: If you're going to apologize, you should do it right away.
spanish: Si te vas a disculpar, lo deberías hacer en seguida.

english: In Italian everything is written the way you pronounce it.
spanish: En italiano todo se escribe como se pronuncia.

english: In South America, there are many traces of Indian culture.
spanish: En América del Sur hay muchas huellas de la cultura india.

english: In accepting the money, he lost the respect of the people.
spanish: Al aceptar el dinero, perdió el respeto de la gente.

english: In her opinion, he is the best musician she has ever seen.
spanish: Según su opinión, él es el mejor músico que ella haya visto.

english: In our park, we have a nice slide for children to play on.
spanish: En nuestro parque, tenemos un magnífico tobogán para que los niños jueguen.

english: In our park, we have a nice slide for children to play on.
spanish: En nuestro parque, tenemos una magnífica chirristra para que los niños jueguen.

english: In spite of being insulted, he managed to keep his temper.
spanish: A pesar de ser insultado, él consiguió mantener su temperamento.

english: In spite of the fact that she's rich, she says she's poor.
spanish: A pesar de que ella es rica, dice que es pobre.

english: In spite of these dangers, mountaineering is very popular.
spanish: A pesar de ser peligroso, el montañismo es muy popular.

english: Is it OK to feed my dog the same thing that I feed my cat?
spanish: ¿Está bien que le dé de comer a mi perro lo mismo que le doy a mi gato?

english: It almost scared me not to see you online for a whole day.
spanish: Me estaba preocupando un poco no verte online en todo el día.

english: It cost him ten dollars to get the ticket for the musical.
spanish: Le costó 10 dólares conseguir la entrada para el musical.

english: It falls to you to put the finishing touches to this work.
spanish: Te incumbe ponerle los últimos toques a este trabajo.

english: It goes without saying that smoking is bad for the health.
spanish: Se va sin decir que fumar es malo para la salud.

english: It goes without saying that smoking is bad for the health.
spanish: No hace falta decir que fumar es malo para la salud.

english: It is easier to make plans than to put them into practice.
spanish: Es más fácil hacer planes que llevarlos a cabo.

english: It is not manly to speak ill of others behind their backs.
spanish: No es muy varonil hablar mal de los otros detrás de sus espaldas.

english: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.
spanish: Depende de ti decidir si vamos allí o no.

english: It was because of the accident that I was late for school.
spanish: Fue por culpa del accidente que llegué atrasado a la escuela.

english: It was difficult for him to hide his pride in his success.
spanish: Le costaba ocultar su orgullo por su éxito.

english: It was not until the child was fed that he stopped crying.
spanish: El niño no paró de llorar hasta que se le dio de comer.

english: It was not until the sun had set that the child came home.
spanish: No fue hasta que se puso el sol que el niño volvió a casa.

english: It'd be better if you didn't associate with men like that.
spanish: No te deberías asociar con hombres así.

english: It'd be better if you didn't associate with men like that.
spanish: Sería mejor que no te juntaras con hombres así.

english: It's difficult to find one's way around in a strange city.
spanish: Es difícil orientarse en una ciudad desconocida.

english: It's easy to lose track of time when you are in Las Vegas.
spanish: Es fácil perder la noción del tiempo cuando estás en Las Vegas.

english: It's not such a big problem. You're worrying way too much.
spanish: No es un problema tan grave. Te preocupas demasiado.

english: It's not such a big problem. You're worrying way too much.
spanish: No es un problema tan grave. Usted se preocupa demasiado.

english: Japan declared war on the United States in December, 1941.
spanish: Japón le declaró la guerra a Estados Unidos en diciembre del 1941.

english: Japan is one of the greatest economic powers in the world.
spanish: Japón es una de las mayores potencias económicas del mundo.

english: Japan maintains friendly relations with the United States.
spanish: Japón mantiene relaciones amistosas con Estados Unidos.

english: Japan's exports exceeded imports by $77.8 billion in 1998.
spanish: Las exportaciones de Japón superaron a las importaciones por $77.8 billones en el 1998.

english: Let me congratulate you on your victory in the tournament.
spanish: Felicitaciones por su victoria en el torneo.

english: Let's face it, it's impossible. We're never gonna make it.
spanish: Aceptémoslo, es imposible. Nunca lo vamos a lograr.

english: Look, I don't want to do anything to screw it up with Tom.
spanish: Mira, no quiero hacer nada para cagarla con Tom.

english: Mali is one of the poorest countries in Subsaharan Africa.
spanish: Mali es uno de los países más pobres de África subsahariana.

english: Many criminals in the United States are addicted to drugs.
spanish: Muchos criminales en los Estados Unidos son adictos a las drogas.

english: Many improvements have been made since this century began.
spanish: Se han hecho muchas mejoras desde que empezó este siglo.

english: Mary doesn't dance much now, but I know she used to a lot.
spanish: Mary no baila mucho ahora, pero sé que antes bailaba mucho.

english: Mary has nobody to talk with, but she doesn't feel lonely.
spanish: Mary no tiene a nadie con quien hablar, pero no se siente sola.

english: Mary wanted to finish making breakfast before Tom woke up.
spanish: María quería terminar de preparar el desayuno antes de que Tom despertara.

english: Mary was left badly scarred after botched plastic surgery.
spanish: Mary fue dejada gravemente marcada después de la chapuza de cirugía plástica.

english: My grandfather died in the same room in which he was born.
spanish: Mi abuelo murió en la misma habitación en la que nació.

english: My hand is so numb with cold that I can't move my fingers.
spanish: Mi mano está tan entumecida con el frío, que no puedo mover los dedos.

english: My hand is so numb with cold that I can't move my fingers.
spanish: Mi mano está tan dormida con el frío, que no puedo mover los dedos.

english: My little brother ran through the living room stark naked.
spanish: Mi hermano pequeño cruzó el salón corriendo totalmente desnudo.

english: My little sister doesn't like the taste of cottage cheese.
spanish: A mi hermana pequeña no le gusta el sabor del queso fresco.

english: My neighbor's son made fun of my daughter today at school.
spanish: El hijo de mi vecina se ha burlado de mi hija hoy en la escuela.

english: My shoelaces came untied as I was walking down the street.
spanish: Se me desamarraron los cordones mientras iba caminando por la calle.

english: My uncle kept on drinking in spite of his doctor's advice.
spanish: Mi tío siguió bebiendo a pesar de los consejos de su médico.

english: My wife spends money as if I were the richest man in town.
spanish: Mi esposa gasta dinero como si yo fuera el hombre más rico en la ciudad.

english: Never choose a new vocation just because you are restless.
spanish: Nunca elijas una nueva vocación sólo porque estás inquieto.

english: New facts about ancient China have recently come to light.
spanish: Recientemente salieron a la luz nuevos datos sobre la China antigua.

english: Next Monday, she'll have been in the hospital for a month.
spanish: El lunes que viene llevará un mes en el hospital.

english: Ninety-five percent of orphans are older than 5 years old.
spanish: Noventa y cinco por ciento de los huérfanos son mayores de 5 años.

english: Nobody will say it so bluntly, but that is the gist of it.
spanish: Nadie lo diría tan sin rodeos, pero eso es la esencia de ello.

english: Not only did he refuse to help me, but also he scolded me.
spanish: No solo se negó a ayudarme, sino que además me regañó.

english: Not only should you vote, you have an obligation to do so.
spanish: No solo debes votar, estás obligado a hacerlo.

english: Nothing in the world is stronger than the will to survive.
spanish: Nada en el mundo es más fuerte que la voluntad de sobrevivir.

english: Now he is recognized as one of the most promising writers.
spanish: Ahora él es reconocido como uno de los escritores más prometedores.

english: Now that you are eighteen, you can get a driver's license.
spanish: Ahora que acabas de cumplir dieciocho, te puedes sacar el carnet de conducir.

english: Now that you are eighteen, you can get a driver's license.
spanish: Ahora que tienes dieciocho años, puedes sacar una licencia de conducir.

english: Now's the time to decide if you want to go with us or not.
spanish: Ahora es la hora de decidir si quieres ir con nosotros o no.

english: Of course, many senior citizens are happy with retirement.
spanish: Por supuesto, muchos ciudadanos de la tercera edad son felices con el retiro.

english: Of course, many senior citizens are happy with retirement.
spanish: Por supuesto, muchos ciudadanos de la tercera edad son felices con la jubilación.

english: On the fifteenth of August, thousands of people fly kites.
spanish: El quince de agosto, miles de personas elevan volantines.

english: One cannot judge people only by their outward appearances.
spanish: Uno no puede juzgar a la gente solo por su apariencia externa.

english: One constellation that most people know is the Big Dipper.
spanish: Una constelación que la mayoría de la gente conoce es el Carro.

english: Our teacher tried to use a new method of teaching English.
spanish: Nuestro profesor probó un nuevo método para enseñar inglés.

english: Our television has been out of order for more than a week.
spanish: Nuestro televisor lleva averiado más de una semana.

english: Passengers became nervous when the plane began to vibrate.
spanish: Los pasajeros se pusieron nerviosos cuando el avión comenzó a vibrar.

english: People of my generation all think the same way about this.
spanish: Toda la gente de mi generación piensa igual sobre esto.

english: People say that Japan is the richest country in the world.
spanish: Dicen que Japón es el país más rico del mundo.

english: People usually become famous at the cost of their privacy.
spanish: La gente por lo general se vuelve famosa a costa de su privacidad.

english: Plans for a new trade zone are still on the drawing board.
spanish: Los planes para una nueva zona de libre comercio todavía están en el borrador.

english: Please be sure to bring some of your friends to the party.
spanish: Haz el favor de traerte a algunos de tus amigos a la fiesta.

english: Please don't look at your mobile phone while we're eating.
spanish: Por favor, no mires tu celular mientras estamos comiendo.

english: Please lend me the book when you have finished reading it.
spanish: Por favor, préstame el libro cuando hayas terminado de leerlo.

english: Please let me know if you find any typos or missing words.
spanish: Por favor dime si encuentras algún error mecanográfico o palabras que se hayan saltado.

english: Please make sure that your seat belt is securely fastened.
spanish: Por favor, asegúrese de que su cinturón de seguridad está bien puesto.

english: Seen from an airplane, the island looks like a big spider.
spanish: Vista desde un avión, la isla parece una araña grande.

english: Several students were absent from school because of colds.
spanish: Varios estudiantes faltaron al colegio debido a resfriados.

english: She cooks for him every day, but he doesn't appreciate it.
spanish: Ella cocina para él todos los días, pero él no lo aprecia.

english: She intends to play tennis this afternoon with her father.
spanish: Ella pretende jugar tenis con su padre esta tarde.

english: She knew that if she started to cry her mascara would run.
spanish: Ella sabía que si empezaba a llorar se le correría el rímel.

english: She read his letter, with tears streaming down her cheeks.
spanish: Ella leyó su carta, con lágrimas cayendo por sus mejillas.

english: She was disappointed, and angry with herself for being so.
spanish: Ella estaba desilusionada y enojada consigo misma por ser así.

english: She was the last person I expected to see in such a place.
spanish: Ella era la última persona que esperaba ver en un sitio como ése.

english: She's made up her mind and refuses to be talked out of it.
spanish: Ella tomó una decisión y se niega a ser disuadida.

english: Six percent home loans represent the industry average now.
spanish: Los préstamos del seis porciento representan el promedio de la industria ahora.

english: Some dog owners wonder if it's OK to feed their dogs fish.
spanish: Algunos dueños de perros se preguntan si estará bien darles de comer pescado a sus perros.

english: Some old lady told Tom that he looked like Charles Darwin.
spanish: Una señora mayor le dijo a Tom que se veía como Charles Darwin.

english: Some teenagers smashed our pumpkins just before Halloween.
spanish: Algunos adolescentes machacaron nuestras calabazas justo antes de Halloween.

english: Step out of the car and place your hands behind your back.
spanish: Dé un paso fuera del auto y ponga las manos hacia atrás.

english: Strange to say, I dreamed the same dream twice last night.
spanish: Aunque suene extraño, anoche tuve el mismo sueño dos veces.

english: Strictly speaking, there were some mistakes in his speech.
spanish: Estrictamente hablando, hubo varios errores en su discurso.

english: São Paulo is the biggest producer of eggs in the country.
