spanish: Las voces provenientes de la jungla espantaron a los exploradores.

english: The weather was getting worse and worse as the day went on.
spanish: El tiempo va empeorando a medida que avanza el día.

english: There are so many stars in the sky, I can't count them all.
spanish: Hay tantas estrellas en el cielo que no puedo contarlas todas.

english: There are some misprints, but all in all, it's a good book.
spanish: Hay algunos errores de impresión, pero en general, es un buen libro.

english: There is absolutely no way that I would go on a trip alone.
spanish: No hay absolutamente ninguna manera en que yo vaya de viaje solo.

english: There was a crowd of people at the entrance of the theater.
spanish: Había un montón de gente a la entrada del teatro.

english: There was a crowd of people at the entrance of the theater.
spanish: Había un mogollón de gente a la entrada del teatro.

english: There was a crowd of people at the entrance of the theater.
spanish: Había mogollón de gente a la entrada del teatro.

english: There was a large audience at the piano recital last night.
spanish: Hubo un mucho público en el recital de piano de anoche.

english: There were many things that I didn't like about that movie.
spanish: Hubo muchas cosas que no me gustaron acerca de la película.

english: There were many things that Tom wanted Mary to do that day.
spanish: Hubo muchas cosas que Tom quiso que Mary hiciera ese día.

english: There were many things that Tom wanted Mary to do that day.
spanish: Había muchas cosas que Tom quería que Mary hiciera ese día.

english: There were only a few patches of vegetation near the river.
spanish: Sólo había algunas manchas de vegetación cerca del río.

english: There's a theory that dog owners often resemble their dogs.
spanish: Hay una teoría que dice que los dueños usualmente se parecen a sus perros.

english: There's something very strange happening here in our house.
spanish: Algo muy raro está sucediendo aquí en casa.

english: These programs had to be paid for by taxes from the people.
spanish: Estos programas tuvieron que ser pagados con los impuestos del pueblo.

english: They sounded the alarm when they saw the enemy approaching.
spanish: Sonaron la alarma cuando vieron al enemigo acercándose.

english: They were all so tired that they could do nothing but yawn.
spanish: Todos estaban tan cansados que no hacían más que bostezar.

english: They won't be able to do anything about that problem today.
spanish: No serán capaces de hacer nada con ese problema hoy.

english: Things might've turned out better if you hadn't gone there.
spanish: Las cosas hubieran terminado mejor si no hubiésemos ido allí.

english: This is going to be the hottest summer in thirty-six years.
spanish: Este va a ser el verano más caluroso en treinta y seis años.

english: This is one of the dictionaries I told you about yesterday.
spanish: Este es uno de los diccionarios de los que te hablé ayer.

english: This is such an easy problem that any student can solve it.
spanish: Este es un problema tan fácil que cualquier estudiante puede resolver.

english: This is the house which was designed by a famous architect.
spanish: Esta es la casa que fue diseñada por un famoso arquitecto.

english: This looks longer than that, but it is an optical illusion.
spanish: Esto parece más largo que eso, pero es una ilusión óptica.

english: This watch needs to be repaired. It gains 20 minutes a day.
spanish: Hay que arreglar este reloj. Se adelanta veinte minutos en un día.

english: Three-fourths of the earth's surface is covered with water.
spanish: Tres cuartos de la superficie de la Tierra están cubiertos de agua.

english: Tom adjusted the seat, put in the key, and then drove away.
spanish: Tom ajustó el asiento, metió la llave y se fue conduciendo.

english: Tom almost always uses a credit card when he goes shopping.
spanish: Tom casi siempre usa una tarjeta de crédito cuando va de compras.

english: Tom and Mary were out on the balcony at two in the morning.
spanish: Tom y Mary estaban fuera en el balcón a las dos de la mañana.

english: Tom and Mary were still sleeping when John left for school.
spanish: Tom y Mary estaban aún durmiendo cuando John se fue a la escuela.

english: Tom asked Mary about the accident that she was involved in.
spanish: Tom le preguntó a Mary acerca del accidente en el que estaba involucrada.

english: Tom began to believe that he'd never be able to walk again.
spanish: Tom empezó a creer que él nunca sería capaz de caminar otra vez.

english: Tom began to believe that he'd never be able to walk again.
spanish: Tom empezó a creer que nunca podría volver a andar.

english: Tom can play the harmonica and the guitar at the same time.
spanish: Tom puede tocar la armónica y la guitarra al mismo tiempo.

english: Tom can swim faster than anyone else in his swimming class.
spanish: Tom puede nadar más rápido que cualquier otro de su clase de natación.

english: Tom can't carry all those suitcases so you should help him.
spanish: Tom no puede cargar todas esas valijas, así que deberías ayudarle.

english: Tom couldn't believe how ugly Mary became as she got older.
spanish: Tom no podía creer lo fea que se volvía María a medida que envejecía.

english: Tom couldn't control himself when he saw Mary kissing John.
spanish: Tomás no se pudo controlar al ver a María besando a Juan.

english: Tom couldn't rule out the possibility that he was mistaken.
spanish: Tom no pudo descartar la posibilidad de que él estuviera equivocado.

english: Tom couldn't understand why no one else seemed to be happy.
spanish: Tom no podía entender por qué nadie más parecía estar contento.

english: Tom decided not to buy the car he was looking at yesterday.
spanish: Tom decidió no comprar el auto que estaba viendo ayer.

english: Tom decided to snoop around and see what he could find out.
spanish: Tom decidió fisgonear y ver que podía averiguar.

english: Tom didn't bring the matter up at the meeting this morning.
spanish: Tom no sacó el tema en la reunión de esta mañana.

english: Tom didn't even have the courtesy to say that he was sorry.
spanish: Tom ni siquiera tuvo la cortesía de decir que lo sentía.

english: Tom didn't want Mary to see his painting until it was done.
spanish: Tom no quería que María viera su pintura hasta que estuviera lista.

english: Tom died in the evening of the day he and Mary got married.
spanish: Tom murió la noche del día en que él y Mary se casaron.

english: Tom doesn't have to wash the car. Mary's already washed it.
spanish: Tom no necesita lavar el auto. Mary ya lo lavó.

english: Tom doesn't like it when people park in front of his house.
spanish: A Tom no le gusta cuando la gente estaciona enfrente de su casa.

english: Tom doesn't remember too much about what happened that day.
spanish: Tom no recuerda mucho acerca de lo que sucedió aquel día.

english: Tom doesn't think Mary's French pronunciation is very good.
spanish: Tom no cree que la pronunciación francesa de Mary sea muy buena.

english: Tom doesn't want his parents to find out that he was drunk.
spanish: Tom no quiere que sus padres se enteren de que él estaba borracho.

english: Tom doesn't want you to share this information with anyone.
spanish: Tom no quiere que compartas esta información con nadie.

english: Tom followed in his father's footsteps and became a lawyer.
spanish: Tom siguió los pasos de su padre y llegó a ser abogado.

english: Tom got paint on his shirt while he was painting the fence.
spanish: Tom dejó caer pintura en su camisa mientras pintaba la cerca.

english: Tom has been playing the violin for more than thirty years.
spanish: Tom ha tocado el violín por más de treinta años.

english: Tom has been to this park with Mary at least a dozen times.
spanish: Tom ha estado con Mary en este parque al menos doce veces.

english: Tom is a New Yorker, but he doesn't have a New York accent.
spanish: Tom es neoyorquino, pero no tiene acento de Nueva York.

english: Tom is exactly the sort of guy Mary wants to hang out with.
spanish: Tom es exactamente la clase de tipo con el que María quiere salir.

english: Tom is still the same weight he was when he was a teenager.
spanish: Tom aún mantiene el peso que tenía cuando era adolescente.

english: Tom is sure that Mary didn't really go to Boston last week.
spanish: Tom está seguro de que Mary en realidad no fue a Boston la semana pasada.

english: Tom is the kind of guy that a girl could fall in love with.
spanish: Tom es la clase de tipo del que una niña se podría enamorar.

english: Tom leaned in and gave Mary a passionate kiss on the mouth.
spanish: Tom se inclinó y le dio a Mary un beso apasionado en la boca.

english: Tom makes a lot of money translating menus for restaurants.
spanish: Tom gana mucho dinero traduciendo menús para restaurantes.

english: Tom noticed that Mary was sitting in the corner by herself.
spanish: Tom notó que María estaba sentada sola en la esquina.

english: Tom opened the window a crack to let in a bit of fresh air.
spanish: Tom abrió un poco la ventana para dejar entrar un poco de aire.

english: Tom planted three apple trees and a peach tree in his yard.
spanish: Tom plantó tres manzanos y un melocotonero en su jardín.

english: Tom postponed his party until Mary got out of the hospital.
spanish: Tom pospuso su fiesta hasta que María saliera del hospital.

english: Tom put the new tablecloth he had just bought on the table.
spanish: Tom puso el mantel nuevo que acababa de comprar en la mesa.

english: Tom rinsed off the plates and put them into the dishwasher.
spanish: Tom enjuagó los platos y los puso dentro del lavavajillas.

english: Tom shared the apartment with Mary and three other friends.
spanish: Tom compartía departamento con Mary y otros tres amigos.

english: Tom should have told Mary right away that he wasn't single.
spanish: Tom debió haberle dicho enseguida que él no era soltero.

english: Tom smuggled a bottle of whiskey into Mary's hospital room.
spanish: Tom metió de contrabando una botella de whisky a la habitación de Mary en el hospital.

english: Tom thought Mary was the most beautiful woman in the world.
spanish: Tom pensaba que Mary era la mujer más linda del mundo.

english: Tom thought that the amulet would protect him from witches.
spanish: Tom pensó que el amuleto lo protegería contra brujas.

english: Tom told Mary that he had finished the work a few days ago.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que él había terminado el trabajo hace unos días atrás.

english: Tom told Mary that he thought John was really stressed out.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que pensaba que John estaba verdaderamente nervioso.

english: Tom told Mary that he wouldn't be doing anything dangerous.
spanish: Tom le dijo a Mary que él no haría nada peligroso.

english: Tom took one of the shirts out of the closet and put it on.
spanish: Tom sacó una de las camisas del armario y se la puso.

english: Tom took the CD out of its case and put it into the player.
spanish: Tom sacó el CD de su caja y lo puso en el reproductor.

english: Tom wanted to eat at the small restaurant behind the hotel.
spanish: Tom quería comer en el pequeño restaurante detrás del hotel.

english: Tom was caught red-handed, stealing from the cash register.
spanish: Tom fue atrapado con las manos en la masa, robando de la caja registradora.

english: Tom was looking for some people to help him move his piano.
spanish: Tom estaba buscando gente que le ayudara a mover su piano.

english: Tom was really glad to hear that Mary had passed her exams.
spanish: Tom estaba realmente contento al oír que María había aprobado sus exámenes.

english: Tom was relieved to hear that Mary had arrived home safely.
spanish: Tom estaba aliviado al oír que María había llegado sana y salva a casa.

english: Tom was stupid enough to challenge Mary to a game of chess.
spanish: Tom fue lo suficientemente estúpido para desafiar a María a una partida de ajedrez.

english: Tom was unable to remember what he had eaten for breakfast.
spanish: Tom no podía recordar qué había comido de desayuno.

english: Tom went out for a walk as he always does in the afternoon.
spanish: Tom salió a dar un paseo como lo hace siempre en la tarde.

english: Tom won't ever be able to forgive Mary for cheating on him.
spanish: Tom jamás podrá perdonar a Mary por haberlo engañado.

english: Tom wondered how long it would take Mary to finish the job.
spanish: Tom se preguntaba cuánto le tomaría a María terminar el trabajo.

english: Unless I leave right away, I'll be late for my appointment.
spanish: Si no me voy inmediatamente llegaré tarde a mi cita.

english: We cannot tell a good person from a bad one by looks alone.
spanish: No podemos diferenciar a una persona buena de una mala sólo por su apariencia.

english: We did not evolve from monkeys. We share a common ancestor.
spanish: No descendemos de los monos. Compartimos un ancestro común.

english: We have absolute proof that smoking is bad for your health.
spanish: Tenemos la prueba absoluta de que fumar es malo para la salud.

english: We have to put the piano on its side in order to get it in.
spanish: Hay que poner el piano de lado para que entre.

english: We heard the explosion and saw the house burst into flames.
spanish: Oímos la explosión y vimos la casa prenderse en llamas.

english: We were deeply impressed by the lecturer's eloquent speech.
spanish: Estábamos profundamente impresionados por el elocuente discurso del expositor.

english: We'd better hurry. I don't want to be late for the concert.
spanish: Mejor apurémonos. No quiero llegar tarde al concierto.

english: What effect did the doctor say this medicine has on people?
spanish: ¿Qué efecto dijo el doctor que tenía esta medicina en la gente?

english: What is the difference between imitation and real diamonds?
spanish: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre los diamantes de imitación y los reales?

english: What she lacks in charisma she makes up for with hard work.
spanish: Lo que le falta en carisma, ella lo compensa con trabajo duro.

english: What sort of jewelry are you going to wear with this dress?
spanish: ¿Qué clase de joyería vas a usar con este vestido?

english: What you're saying now has nothing to do with the question.
spanish: Lo que dice usted ahora no viene a cuento.

english: When I have finished my lunch, I will lie down for an hour.
spanish: Cuando haya terminado mi almuerzo, me recostaré por una hora.

english: When I left the house this morning, Tom was still sleeping.
spanish: Cuando salí de casa esta mañana, Tom todavía estaba durmiendo.

english: When I opened my eyes, I realized she was right by my side.
spanish: Al abrir los ojos me di cuenta que ella estaba justo al lado mío.

english: When I was a child, I was spanked if I did something wrong.
spanish: Cuando era pequeño, me daban unos azotes cuando hacía algo malo.

english: When I was young, I tried to read as many books as I could.
spanish: Cuando yo era joven intentaba leer tantos libros como pudiera.

english: When I was young, I would often go to watch baseball games.
spanish: Cuando yo era joven, solía ir a ver partidos de béisbol.

english: When I woke up this morning, the rain had turned into snow.
spanish: Cuando me he levantado esta mañana, la lluvia se había convertido en nieve.

english: While employed at the bank, he taught economics at college.
spanish: Mientras trabajaba en un banco, enseñaba economía en una universidad.

english: Why do you think Tom and Mary are planning to get divorced?
spanish: ¿Por qué piensas que Tom y Mary están planeando divorciarse?

english: Why would anyone hide something like that inside this cave?
spanish: ¿Por qué alguien escondería algo así dentro de esta cueva?

english: Will you please explain the meaning of this sentence to me?
spanish: ¿Me explicarías por favor el significado de esa frase?

english: You can see the smokestacks of the factory from the window.
spanish: Desde la ventana se ven las chimeneas de la fábrica.

english: You got better because you did everything the doctor asked.
spanish: Te pusiste mejor porque hiciste todo lo que te dijo el médico.

english: You may be right, but we have a slightly different opinion.
spanish: Puede que esté en lo correcto, pero nuestra opinión es ligeramente diferente.

english: You must have a lot of patience to learn foreign languages.
spanish: Hay que tener mucha paciencia para aprender lenguas extranjeras.

english: You promised that you'd stand by me through thick and thin.
spanish: Me prometiste que estarías conmigo en lo bueno y en lo malo.

english: You should avoid tight fitting clothes if you are pregnant.
spanish: No deberías usar ropa ajustada si estás embarazada.

english: You shouldn't say such a thing in the presence of children.
spanish: No deberías decir esa clase de cosas cuando hay niños cerca.

english: You're the only person I know that has ever visited Boston.
spanish: Eres la única persona que conozco que ha visitado Boston.

english: You're under arrest for endangering the welfare of a minor.
spanish: Está detenido por poner en peligro el bienestar de un menor.

english: "I don't have my license with me." "No problem, I'll drive."
spanish: "No tengo mi permiso de conducir conmigo." "No hay problema, yo conduciré."

english: "This used to be such a friendly place." "Tell me about it."
spanish: «Este lugar solía ser tan agradable.» «Hábleme de ello.»

english: A dog that barks all the time doesn't make a good watch dog.
spanish: Un perro que está siempre ladrando no es un buen perro guardián.

english: A high degree of specialization is required in that company.
spanish: Un alto grado de especialización es requerido en esta compañía.

english: A society without religion is like a ship without a compass.
spanish: Una sociedad sin religión es como un barco sin brújula.

english: A time bomb went off in the airport killing thirteen people.
spanish: Una bomba de tiempo estalló en el aeropuerto matando a trece personas.

english: A water molecule has two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
spanish: Una molécula de agua tiene dos átomos de hidrógeno y un átomo de oxígeno.

english: Afraid of hurting his feelings, I didn't tell him the truth.
spanish: No le dije la verdad por miedo a herir sus sentimientos.

english: After winning all the matches, he got the title of champion.
spanish: Después de vencer en todos los encuentros, obtuvo el título de campeón.

english: After you finish reading the book, put it back where it was.
spanish: Después de que hayas terminado de leer el libro, ponlo de vuelta al sitio donde estaba.

english: All Tom wanted was for Mary to learn to get along with John.
spanish: Todo lo que Tom quería era que Mary aprendiera a llevarse bien con John.

english: All taxpayers have the right to know where their money goes.
spanish: Todo contribuyente tiene el derecho a saber adonde va su dinero.

english: All the doctor's efforts were in vain and the man soon died.
spanish: Todos los esfuerzos del médico fueron en vano, enseguida el hombre murió.

english: All you have to do is study hard to get into a good college.
spanish: Todo lo que debes hacer es estudiar duro para ser admitido en una buena universidad.

english: An artist uses many tubes of paint to make a large painting.
spanish: Un artista ocupa muchos tubos de pintura para hacer una pintura grande.

english: An orphan at three, he was brought up by a distant relative.
spanish: Se quedó huérfano a los tres años, y fue criado por un pariente lejano.

english: Are they arriving at ten o'clock in the morning or at night?
spanish: ¿Llegan a las diez de la mañana o de la noche?

english: Are you honestly telling me you never want to see Tom again?
spanish: ¿Me estás diciendo honestamente que no quieres ver a Tom nunca más?

english: Are you seriously thinking about starting your own business?
spanish: ¿Estás pensando seriamente en comenzar tu propio negocio?

english: Are you sure you don't want to use the toilet before you go?
spanish: ¿Estás seguro de que no quieres ir al baño antes de salir?

english: As far as I know, the novel is not translated into Japanese.
spanish: Hasta donde yo sé, la novela no está traducida al japonés.

english: As his lips got bluer, I nervously waited for the ambulance.
spanish: Esperaba ansiosamente a la ambulancia mientras sus labios se ponían azules.

english: As soon as he opened the door, he smelled something burning.
spanish: En el instante en que él abrió la puerta, él olió algo quemándose.

english: As soon as the lesson was over, they rushed out of the room.
spanish: Tan pronto como terminó la clase, salieron pitando del aula.

english: Bad drivers should have their licenses taken away from them.
spanish: Los conductores irresponsables deberían tener retenidas sus licencias.

english: Be sure to look over your paper again before you hand it in.
spanish: Asegúrate de echarle un vistazo a tu trabajo antes de entregarlo.

english: Because of the rain, we weren't able to play tennis outside.
spanish: A causa de la lluvia, no pudimos jugar al tenis fuera.

english: Believe none of what you hear and only half of what you see.
spanish: No creas nada de lo que oigas, y solo la mitad de lo que veas.

english: Both my brothers are married, but my sisters are all single.
spanish: Mis dos hermanos están casados, pero todas mis hermanas son solteras.

english: Business is brisk now and we are up to the elbows in orders.
spanish: El negocio es dinámico ahora y estamos hasta los codos de pedidos.

english: By the age of 25, she had lived in five different countries.
spanish: A los 25 años, ella había vivido en cinco países diferentes.

english: By the time I got to the station, my train had already left.
spanish: Cuando llegué a la estación, mi tren ya había partido.

english: By the time the sun sets, we will arrive at the destination.
spanish: Llegaremos a nuestro destino para cuando el sol se ponga.

english: California was the 31st state admitted to the United States.
spanish: California fue el trigésimo primer estado admitido en los Estados Unidos.

english: Did you find the umbrella you said you'd lost the other day?
spanish: ¿Encontraste el paraguas que dijiste que habías perdido el otro día?

english: Did you know there were a few foxes living on this mountain?
spanish: ¿Sabías que había unos cuantos zorros viviendo en esta montaña?

english: Do you know how many people died in yesterday's plane crash?
spanish: ¿Sabes cuántas personas murieron en el accidente de avión de ayer?

english: Do you want to go out or stay at home? Either is OK with me.
spanish: ¿Quieres salir o quedarte en casa? A mí me da lo mismo.

english: Every child needs a father or a father figure in their life.
spanish: Todo niño necesita un padre y una figura paterna en su vida.

english: Excuse me, but could you tell me how to get to Central Park?
spanish: Perdone, ¿podría decirme cómo llegar a Central Park?

english: Excuse me, would you show me how to use the washing machine?
spanish: Perdone, ¿le importaría enseñarme cómo se usa la lavadora?

english: Germany is one of the largest cheese producers in the world.
spanish: Alemania es uno de los productores de queso más grandes del mundo.

english: Have you finished reading the book I lent you the other day?
spanish: ¿Terminaste de leer el libro que te presté el otro día?

english: Having failed twice yesterday, he doesn't want to try again.
spanish: Como falló dos veces ayer, no quiere volver a intentarlo.

english: He didn't deny that he was formerly involved in the program.
spanish: Él no negó que anteriormente estuvo involucrado en el programa.

english: He explained to Mary why he was late for her birthday party.
spanish: Él le explicó a Mary por qué llegaba tarde a su fiesta de cumpleaños.

english: He left for Europe a week ago, that is, on the tenth of May.
spanish: Él salió hacia Europa hace una semana, eso es, el diez de mayo.

english: He met many fascinating people in the course of his travels.
spanish: Conoció a muchas personas fascinantes en el curso de sus viajes.

english: He opened his mouth as if to speak, but didn't say anything.
spanish: Abrió la boca como si fuera a hablar, pero no dijo nada.

english: He said he wouldn't go to the party because he had to study.
spanish: Él dijo que no iba a la fiesta porque tenía que estudiar.

english: He took charge of the family business after his father died.
spanish: Él se hizo cargo de los negocios de la familia después de la muerte de su padre.

english: He wanted them to go to college and learn to be businessmen.
spanish: Él quería que fueran a la universidad y aprendieran a ser hombres de negocios.

english: He who fights may lose, but he who doesn't has already lost.
spanish: Quien lucha puede perder, quien no lucha ya perdió.

english: He who fights may lose, but he who doesn't has already lost.
spanish: El que lucha puede perder, el que no lucha ya perdió.

english: He's given to going overboard every time he gets a new idea.
spanish: Le da por exagerar cada vez que tiene una nueva idea.

english: Her son is a mama's boy. He has to be with her all the time.
spanish: Su hijo está bien mimado. Tiene que estar con ella siempre.

english: His bag is right here, so he cannot have gone to school yet.
spanish: Su bolsa está aquí, así que no puede haberse ido a la escuela aún.

english: His public support for the British government was unpopular.
spanish: Su apoyo público al gobierno británico era impopular.

english: Holmes went out of the room without being noticed by anyone.
spanish: Holmes salió de la habitación sin que nadie se diera cuenta.

english: How could you just walk out the door without saying goodbye?
spanish: ¿Cómo pudiste salir por la puerta así nada más sin despedirte?

english: How do you console a woman who has just lost her only child?
spanish: ¿Cómo consolar a una mujer que acaba de perder a su único hijo?

english: How long does it take for a veterinarian to examine a horse?
spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo necesita un veterinario para examinar a un caballo?

english: How many times do you go to the beach to swim in the summer?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces vas a la playa a nadar en el verano?

english: I always end up looking up the same words in the dictionary.
spanish: Siempre termino buscando las mismas palabras en el diccionario.

english: I am going to do my homework when I get home this afternoon.
spanish: Voy a hacer la tarea a la tarde cuando llegue a casa.

english: I am going to do my homework when I get home this afternoon.
spanish: Voy a hacer los deberes esta tarde cuando llegue a casa.

english: I believe, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that she is innocent.
spanish: Creo, sin sombra de duda, que ella es inocente.

english: I bought this book at the bookstore in front of the station.
spanish: Compré este libro en la librería frente a la estación.

english: I can still remember the time when Tom fell out of the tree.
spanish: Todavía me puedo acordar de la vez que Tom se cayó del árbol.

english: I can't figure out why someone would do something like that.
spanish: No puedo entender por qué alguien haría algo como eso.

english: I checked twice to make certain we hadn't made any mistakes.
spanish: Revisé dos veces para estar seguro de que no habíamos cometido ningún error.

english: I copied in my notebook whatever he wrote on the blackboard.
spanish: Copié en mi cuaderno lo que él escribió en la pizarra.

english: I don't have any more room on my shelves for any more books.
spanish: No me queda sitio en mis estanterías para más libros.

english: I don't have any more room on my shelves for any more books.
spanish: No tengo sitio en mis estanterías para un libro más.

english: I don't know if I'll be able to eat lunch with you tomorrow.
spanish: No sé si voy a poder almorzar con vos mañana.

english: I don't know what that word means, but I'll try to find out.
spanish: No se qué significa esa palabra, pero trataré de averiguarlo.

english: I don't think she'll be happy living with her mother-in-law.
spanish: No creo que sea muy feliz viviendo con su suegra.

english: I don't think you're as good of a driver as you say you are.
spanish: No creo que seas tan buen conductor como dices.

english: I don't want you to feel that I'm pressuring you to do this.
spanish: No quiero que sientas que te estoy presionando para que hagas esto.

english: I dreamed that I was eating my granddaughter's wedding cake.
spanish: Soñé que me estaba comiendo la tarta de bodas de mi nieta.

english: I enforce the rules even though I don't agree with them all.
spanish: Yo hago cumplir las reglas a pesar de que no estoy de acuerdo con todas.

english: I found a note on the table, but I don't know who it's from.
spanish: Encontré una nota en la mesa, pero no sé de quién es.

english: I guess it will be a long time before I can return to Japan.
spanish: Supongo que pasará mucho tiempo antes de que pueda volver a Japón.

english: I have a cat and a dog. The cat's black and the dog's white.
spanish: Tengo un gato y un perro. El gato es negro y el perro es blanco.

english: I have a feeling that something dreadful is going to happen.
spanish: Tengo la sensación de que algo terrible va a pasar.

english: I have three dogs. One is male and the other two are female.
spanish: Tengo tres perros. Uno es macho, y las otras dos son hembras.

english: I hope that you will continue to favor us with your support.
spanish: Espero que siga favoreciéndonos con su apoyo.

english: I hope to one day speak German as well as you speak English.
spanish: Algún día espero hablar tan bien alemán como tú hablas inglés.

english: I invited twelve people to my party, but one could not come.
spanish: Invité a doce personas a mi fiesta, pero una no pudo venir.

english: I know I probably don't say it often enough, but I love you.
spanish: Sé que posiblemente no lo diga lo suficientemente a menudo, pero te amo.

english: I know Tom is a friend of yours, but I still don't like him.
spanish: Sé que Tom es tu amigo, pero no me agrada mucho de todas formas.

english: I know an English language instructor who comes from Canada.
spanish: Conozco a un profesor de inglés que viene de Canadá.

english: I make it a rule not to watch television after nine o'clock.
spanish: Tomé como regla no mirar televisión después de las nueve.

english: I never thought I would have to support such a large family.
spanish: Jamás pensé que tendría que sostener a una familia tan numerosa.

english: I never thought it'd be this easy to hack into your website.
spanish: Nunca pensé que sería así de fácil infiltrarme en tu sitio web.

english: I promise that this discussion will be the last of its kind.
spanish: Prometo que este tipo de discusión no se repetirá más.

english: I saw a lady go through the gate without showing her ticket.
spanish: Vi a una señora atravesar la puerta sin enseñar su boleto.

english: I spent two hours watching a baseball game on TV last night.
spanish: Anoche me pasé dos horas viendo en la TV un partido de béisbol.

english: I spent two hours yesterday trying to fix that broken radio.
spanish: Ayer pasé dos horas intentando arreglar esa radio rota.

english: I think Tom's grandmother is too old to be wearing a bikini.
spanish: Pienso que la abuela de Tom es muy vieja para estar usando una bikini.

english: I think it's time for me to reconsider how I've been living.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que me replantee cómo he estado viviendo.

english: I think it's unlikely that Tom will come to the party alone.
spanish: Creo que es improbable que Tom venga solo a la fiesta.

english: I think that our living together has influenced your habits.
spanish: Creo que nuestra convivencia ha influenciado tu forma de vida.

english: I thought about how much had happened in the last two hours.
spanish: Pensé en qué tanto había pasado en las pasadas dos horas.

english: I tried to cheer her up, but all she wanted was to be alone.
spanish: Intenté animarla, pero lo único que ella quería era estar sola.

english: I understand the sentence, but I'm not able to translate it.
spanish: Yo entiendo la frase, pero no logro traducirla.

english: I was a member of the soccer club when I was in junior high.
spanish: Yo fui miembro del club de fútbol cuando estaba en secundaria.

english: I was just about to leave the house when the telephone rang.
spanish: Estaba a punto de salir de la casa cuando sonó el teléfono.

english: I was thinking of going out and buying a whole new wardrobe.
spanish: Estuve pensando en salir y comprar todo un nuevo armario.

english: I will see my friends tonight, but my sister won't see hers.
spanish: Veré a mis amigos esta noche, pero mi hermana no verá a los suyos.

english: I will show you a new approach to foreign language learning.
spanish: Te mostraré un nuevo enfoque para el aprendizaje de idiomas extranjeros.

english: I would have liked to come with you, but I didn't have time.
spanish: Me hubiera gustado ir contigo pero no tenía tiempo.

english: I would rather stay at home than go out in this hot weather.
spanish: Preferiría quedarme en casa a salir con este calor.

english: I'd rather live in peaceful poverty than in wealth and fear.
spanish: Preferiría vivir pacíficamente en la pobreza que atemorizado en la riqueza.

english: I'll get in touch with you as soon as I return from America.
spanish: Me pondré en contacto contigo en cuanto regrese de Estados Unidos.

english: I'm sure there is nobody as kind as you are the whole world.
spanish: Yo estoy seguro de que no hay nadie tan gentil como tú en todo el mundo.

english: I've been saving this bottle of wine for a special occasion.
spanish: He guardado esta botella de vino para una ocasión especial.

english: I've heard that he won't be in this country for a long time.
spanish: Por lo que oí, él no estará por mucho tiempo en este país.

english: I've seen the film many times, but I'd like to see it again.
spanish: He visto varias veces la película, pero me gustaría verla de nuevo.

english: If I do this, will it be viewed by others in a negative way?
spanish: Si hago esto, ¿los otros lo verán de un modo negativo?

english: If it had not been for civil war, they would be wealthy now.
spanish: Si no hubiera sido por la guerra civil, ahora ellos serían ricos.

english: If it had not been for your help, he would have been ruined.
spanish: De no haber sido por tu ayuda, él hubiera estado arruinado.

english: If there are houses nearby, a volcano can create a disaster.
spanish: Si hay casas cerca, un volcán puede crear un desastre.

english: If you can't explain it easily, you don't yet understand it.
spanish: Si no puedes explicarlo con facilidad, no lo has entendido todavía.

english: If you get scared during the night, just turn on your light.
spanish: Si te entra miedo por la noche enciende la luz.

english: If you trust such a fellow, you'll lose everything you have.
spanish: Si confías en un tipo así, perderás todo lo que tienes.

english: If you want something done right, you should do it yourself.
spanish: Si quieres que algo se haga bien, debes hacerlo tú mismo.

english: If you want to avoid cholesterol, eat lean meat with no fat.
spanish: Si quieres evitar el colesterol, come carnes magras sin grasa.

english: If your prices are competitive, we will place a large order.
spanish: Si sus precios son competitivos, haremos un pedido mayor.

english: If your prices are competitive, we will place a large order.
spanish: Si vuestros precios son competitivos, haremos un pedido importante.

english: In spite of the language difficulty, we soon became friends.
spanish: A pesar de las dificultades de idioma, todos nos hicimos amigos rápido.

english: In the absence of a better idea I had to choose this method.
spanish: Frente a la ausencia de una mejor idea, tuve que elegir este método.

english: It is difficult for foreigners to get used to Japanese food.
spanish: A los extranjeros les cuesta acostumbrarse a la comida japonesa.

english: It is not rare for girls today to talk as if they were boys.
spanish: No es raro para las niñas de hoy hablar como si fueran niños.

english: It is said that her father was killed in a traffic accident.
spanish: Se dice que su padre murió en un accidente de tránsito.

english: It seemed to me that there was no way out of our difficulty.
spanish: Me parecía que no había salida a nuestro predicamento.

english: It took a long time for me to convince him that I was right.
spanish: Me llevó mucho tiempo convencerlo de que yo tenía razón.

english: It took me a while to understand what she was trying to say.
spanish: Me tomó un poco de tiempo entender lo que ella trataba de decir.

english: It took us a long time, but finally we were able to find it.
spanish: Nos tomó un largo tiempo, pero al fin fuimos capaces de encontrarlo.

english: It was Tom who first suggested that this might be the cause.
spanish: Fue Tom el que sugirió inicialmente que esta podría ser la causa.

english: It was Tom who first suggested that this might be the cause.
spanish: Tom fue el primero que sugirió que esta podría ser la causa.

english: It was once thought that there was intelligent life on Mars.
spanish: Alguna vez se pensó que había vida inteligente en Marte.

english: It was such a hard test that we did not have time to finish.
spanish: Era un examen tan difícil que no tuvimos tiempo de terminarlo.

english: It wasn't easy for Tom to tell Mary what she needed to hear.
spanish: No fue fácil para Tom decirle a Mary lo que necesitaba oír.

english: It'll take me a long time to do all the things I want to do.
spanish: Me tomará un largo tiempo hacer todas las cosas que quiero hacer.

english: It's been almost ten years, but you're as beautiful as ever.
spanish: Ya han pasado casi diez años, pero eres tan bella como siempre.

english: It's better to be approximately right than completely wrong.
spanish: Es mejor estar aproximadamente en lo cierto que estar completamente equivocado.

english: It's hard to predict what the weather will be like tomorrow.
spanish: Es difícil predecir cómo estará el tiempo mañana.

english: It's hard to tell the difference between the truth and lies.
spanish: Es difícil distinguir la verdad de la mentira.

english: It's necessary to make a distinction between the two sounds.
spanish: Hay que hacer una distinción entre los dos sonidos.

english: It's not how much you know, but what you can do that counts.
spanish: No es cuanto sabes, sino lo que puedes hacer lo que cuenta.

english: It's unlikely that our company will make a profit this year.
spanish: No es probable que nuestra compañía obtenga beneficios este año.

english: It's very unlikely that you'll ever see a horse around here.
spanish: Es muy improbable que alguna vez veas un caballo por aquí.
